analyzed: de bzhin du yan lag can rnams las gzhan nyid ni mngon sum gyis bsal ba yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: In the same way, since direct perception eliminates the difference of the parts from the whole,

original: mngon sum gyis gnod pa'i rjes su dpag pas bsal ba yang srang dma' ba'i khyad bar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis gnod pa'i rjes su dpag pas bsal ba yang srang dma' ba'i khyad bar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan zin to //
translated: We have already explained that an inference which contradicts a direct perception is not accepted, just as a scale does not move when a heavy weight is balanced by an equal weight.

original: des na phyogs ltar snang ba gcig po 'di ni gnod pa rnam pa bzhi'i nang du 'dus pa yin no //
analyzed: des na phyogs ltar snang ba gcig po 'di ni gnod pa rnam pa bzhi'i nang du 'dus pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the four types of contradiction are included in this one apparent position.

original: gal te thams cad yan lag can la gnod pa'i dper brjod pa yin par ci ltar rtogs par bya ste ma bstan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te thams cad yan lag can la gnod pa'i dper brjod pa yin par ci ltar rtogs par bya ste ma bstan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If all of these are examples of contradictions of the whole, how are they to be understood, since they are not taught?

original: khas blangs zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khas blangs zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is as follows.

original: chos kyi byad par gnod pa na gnod pa rnam ba bzhi ka srid pa'i rgyus /
analyzed: chos kyi byad par gnod pa na gnod pa rnam ba bzhi ka srid pa'i rgyus /
translated: When there is a contradiction of the property of the subject, all four types of contradiction are possible.

original: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang / de'i khyad par gnod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dper brjod ba gzhan rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: chos can gyi rang gi ngo bo dang / de'i khyad par gnod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dper brjod ba gzhan rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand the other examples of contradictions of the nature of the subject and of its attributes.

original: rang gi ngo bo gnod pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo gnod pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: They are like the contradiction of the nature of the subject and so on.

original: chos kyi rang gi ngo bo la gnod pa rnam ba bzhi 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi rang gi ngo bo la gnod pa rnam ba bzhi 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: The contradiction of the nature of the subject is the four types of contradiction of the property of the subject.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni chos kyi khyad par gnod ba'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni chos kyi khyad par gnod ba'o //
translated: The phrase “and so on” indicates the harm to the specific property.

original: yan lag can gyi gnod par byed pa'i rigs pa nye bar ston pa'i dper brjod pa ni ci skad brjod pa'i phyogs kyis na rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can gyi gnod par byed pa'i rigs pa nye bar ston pa'i dper brjod pa ni ci skad brjod pa'i phyogs kyis na rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: The example that illustrates the reasoning that harms the whole is to be understood by the statement of the position.

original: rang gi ngo bo la gnod pa la sogs pa'i dper brjod pa lhag ma gnyis ci ltar bstan pa de bzhin du dper brjod pa lhag ma gnyis kyang bstan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la gnod pa la sogs pa'i dper brjod pa lhag ma gnyis ci ltar bstan pa de bzhin du dper brjod pa lhag ma gnyis kyang bstan par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the remaining two examples of harm to the intrinsic nature should be presented in the same way as the two remaining examples are presented.

original: sngar bstan pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni rnam par bshad par ro //
analyzed: sngar bstan pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni rnam par bshad par ro //
translated: It was taught earlier.

original: de ltar phyogs kyi mtshan nyid dang @113b der snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyang bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar phyogs kyi mtshan nyid dang @113b der snang ba'i mtshan nyid kyang bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the characteristic of a position and the characteristic of appearance there,

original: rigs pa can la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la /
analyzed: rigs pa can la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la /
translated: with regard to the characteristic of a position of the Naiyāyika and so on,

original: ha cang khyab pa'i nyis ba nyis pa chags pa yin no zhes bstan ba'i don du de'i mtshan nyid nye bar 'god pa ni /
analyzed: ha cang khyab pa'i nyis ba nyis pa chags pa yin no zhes bstan ba'i don du de'i mtshan nyid nye bar 'god pa ni /
translated: it is said that there is the fault of overextension. In order to teach this, its characteristic is presented:

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said.

original: skyon ci yod ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: skyon ci yod ces bya ba ni /
translated: What is the fault?

original: ci ltar sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la skyon med pa de bzhin du 'di la yang yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: ci ltar sangs rgyas pa'i phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la skyon med pa de bzhin du 'di la yang yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: The idea is that just as there is no fault in the definition of the Buddhist position, so also there is no fault in the definition of the non-Buddhist position.

original: ma grub pa'i zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The non-established is the philosophical theory.

original: bsgrub bar bya bar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsgrub bar bya bar gyur pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The object to be established is the present.

original: da ltar ba lo ki tya'i snga rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽gal te yang 'di gnyis sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa de lta na yang ma grub pa nyid la /
analyzed: da ltar ba lo ki tya'i snga rkyen yin pa'i phyir ro // gal te yang 'di gnyis sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa de lta na yang ma grub pa nyid la /
translated: Because it is the antecedent condition of the present.

original: ma grub pa yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pa yang sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if these two are taught as the means of establishing, still the non-established is not the means of establishing the non-established.

original: des na 'di gnyis ni phyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na 'di gnyis ni phyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the idea is that these two are later to be established.

original: de bden pa zhig na zhes bya ba ni ha cang khyab ba spong ba brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de bden pa zhig na zhes bya ba ni ha cang khyab ba spong ba brjod pa'o //
translated: That is true, but he says this to avoid over-extension.

original: gang gi tshe bden snyam na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bden snyam na gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When it is thought that it is true, he says “if”.

original: yang ci ltar na 'di ltar mi 'grub snyam na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na 'di ltar mi 'grub snyam na /
translated: How is it not established in this way?

original: bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He says “the action”.

original: de lta'i bdag min zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta'i bdag min zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “it is not like that” means

original: sgrub par byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin par /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i bdag nyid ma yin par /
translated: that it is not the probandum.

original: gzhan phyir rgol ba la de ltar sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan phyir rgol ba la de ltar sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa ste /
translated: It is presented to the opponent as the very means of proving that.

original: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i tshe nyid sgrub par byed par mi 'dod kyang bsgrub byar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i tshe nyid sgrub par byed par mi 'dod kyang bsgrub byar 'gyur ro //
translated: When it is presented as the means of proving that, even though it is not accepted as the probandum, it follows that it is the probandum.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is called “the activity.”

original: yang na de lta'i min zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa /
analyzed: yang na de lta'i min zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid ma yin pa /
translated: Or, the phrase “it is not like that” means that it is not the probandum.

original: gzhan dag la sgrub bar byed pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i tshe ma zad kyi //
analyzed: gzhan dag la sgrub bar byed pa nyid du nye bar bkod pa de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i tshe ma zad kyi //
translated: It is presented to others as the very means of proving that. When it is presented as the probandum, it is not exhausted.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i tshe yang bsgrub byar mi 'dod na yang bsgrub byar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i tshe yang bsgrub byar mi 'dod na yang bsgrub byar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When it is presented as the means of proving that, even though it is not accepted as the probandum, it follows that it is the probandum.

original: yang na de yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: yang na de yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Or, the phrase “that also” means🔽that it is not the probandum.

original: bsgrub par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yang bsgrub par bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yang bsgrub par bya bar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Not only is the probandum not established, but also the very means of affirmation is reduced to the probandum.🔽How?

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba byis 'gyur ba ci ltar yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba byis 'gyur ba ci ltar yin te /
translated: How is the probandum not established?

original: da ltar pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ltar pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The present alone is the probandum.

original: lan ni de'i tshe zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni de'i tshe zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The answer is: at that time.

original: sgrub par byed ba nyid du bstan pa'i dus na'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed ba nyid du bstan pa'i dus na'o //
translated: At the time when the means of affirmation is being taught.

original: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bdag nyid ma yin par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Not having such a nature.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid ma yin bar ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid ma yin bar ro //
translated: Not having the nature of the probandum.

original: ci ltar de'i tshe bsgrub bya ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar de'i tshe bsgrub bya ma yin zhe na /
translated: How is it not the probandum at that time?

original: de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is said.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed par bstan pa'i dus na /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed par bstan pa'i dus na /
translated: At that time, when the means of affirmation is being taught,

original: mig gis gzung ba nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mig gis gzung ba nyid la sogs pa bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: the eye's being the apprehender, etc. are not the probandum.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa 'o na phyis ci ltar bsgrub byar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa 'o na phyis ci ltar bsgrub byar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If you think that if it is not to be established, then how can it be established later?

original: ma grub ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma grub ba ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “That which is not established.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni ma grub ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin pas na'o //🔽de ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du @114a * //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni ma grub ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid ma yin pas na'o // de ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du @114a * //
translated: “ Therefore” means because that which is not established is not a proof.

original: bstan pa de'o //
analyzed: bstan pa de'o //
translated: That is taught to be a proof.

original: gal te de lta na yang sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i dus na ci ltar bsgrub bya ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i dus na ci ltar bsgrub bya ma yin snyam na /
translated: If you think that even if that is so, then how can it be a thesis at the time of teaching it to be a proof?

original: des na phyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na phyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “Later.”

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan ba'i dus na yang ma grub pa sgrub byed nyid du bstan pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan ba'i dus na yang ma grub pa sgrub byed nyid du bstan pa ni /
translated: At the time of teaching it to be a proof, that which is not established is taught to be a proof.

original: phyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyis dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyis dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Later, it is a thesis by means of being established. This is the meaning.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The argument begins with “If you think…”

original: ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra shes par bya ba nyid du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par byed kyi /
analyzed: ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i sgra shes par bya ba nyid du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba rtogs par byed kyi /
translated: How can the word to be established be understood to be a thesis?

original: bskyed par bya ba'i rang bzhin ni ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba'i rang bzhin ni ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: and not the nature of what is to be generated.

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag kyang brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag kyang brjod par bya bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Likewise, the unestablished reason and example are not to be stated.

original: gal te 'dir zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i dpe dang gtan tshigs dag la'o //
analyzed: gal te 'dir zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i dpe dang gtan tshigs dag la'o //
translated: “Here” means in regard to the unestablished example and reason.

original: gang gi tshe shes bar byed pa'i dbang du byas pa yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes bar byed pa'i dbang du byas pa yin na de'i tshe /
translated: When it is in terms of what is to be known, then

original: shes byed skabs kyis sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i ma grub pa thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes byed skabs kyis sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i ma grub pa thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i sgras rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: all unestablished reasons that are taught as being the proof are understood by the term “what is to be proven.”

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir 'dod pa'i khyad par sgrub par byed par nyid du bstan pa'i ma grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin la brten par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir 'dod pa'i khyad par sgrub par byed par nyid du bstan pa'i ma grub pa ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin la brten par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since that is the case, the unestablished reason that is taught as being the proof of a specific thesis does not rely on such a nature.

original: 'chad pa ni shes par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni shes par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: “Explained” is “what is to be known” and so on.

original: byed pa po la ltos pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de ni shes par byed pa'i skabs kyis bsal bar byed pa la bzlog bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: byed pa po la ltos pa'i bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de ni shes par byed pa'i skabs kyis bsal bar byed pa la bzlog bar bya ba yin la /
translated: The probandum that is dependent on the agent is to be eliminated by the context of the proof.

original: gzhan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bstan pa thams cad ni sdud par byed pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gzhan pa'i bsgrub par bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bstan pa thams cad ni sdud par byed pa kho na'o //
translated: All other proofs that are taught to be proofs are only included.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba gzhan thams cad sdud par byed pa'i phyir na bsgrub bar bya ba gzhan sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni rnam par gcod par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba gzhan thams cad sdud par byed pa'i phyir na bsgrub bar bya ba gzhan sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni rnam par gcod par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since all other probandums are included, the teaching of other proofs as proofs is not able to eliminate.

original: 'o na byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba yang ci ltar rnam par gcod snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba yang ci ltar rnam par gcod snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “How is the probandum of the agent eliminated?”

original: byed pa po'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: byed pa po'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “The agent . . .”

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba gzhan rnam par ma bcad pa bzhin du byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba yang rnam par ma bcad bar ci ste mi 'gyur zhen 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba gzhan rnam par ma bcad pa bzhin du byed pa po'i bsgrub par bya ba yang rnam par ma bcad bar ci ste mi 'gyur zhen 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: If it is like the other probandums that are not eliminated, why is the probandum of the agent not also not eliminated? It is said, “Some . . .”

original: byed pa po'i bsgrub bya rnam par bcad ba nges pa ni /
analyzed: byed pa po'i bsgrub bya rnam par bcad ba nges pa ni /
translated: The ascertainment of the probandum of the proponent is

original: shes par byed pa rgyu'i skabs kyi rgyus rgyu dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: shes par byed pa rgyu'i skabs kyi rgyus rgyu dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: the cause of the cause in the context of the cause of the knower.

original: rgyu med pa rnams kyang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu med pa rnams kyang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Also those without a cause,

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par nges pa'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin par nges pa'o //
translated: means that the unestablished reason and example are ascertained to be the probandum.

original: sgrub bar byed pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgrub bar byed pa nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for the proof,

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du bstan pa'i dam bca' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: it is the thesis that is taught as the probandum.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa gnyi ga'i spyi'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa gnyi ga'i spyi'i mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: The general characteristic of both the teaching as the proof and the teaching as not the proof is

original: des na khyad par @114b 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na khyad par @114b 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: that there is no difference whatsoever.

original: khyad par gzhan bstan pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: khyad par gzhan bstan pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no other characteristic of the other taught as a difference,

original: des na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khyab ches ba'i nyes bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khyab ches ba'i nyes bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and therefore there is the fault of the characteristic of the position being too broad.

original: de dang zhes bya ba ni byed ba bo'i bsgrub par bya ba bzlog par bya ba dang ngo //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba ni byed ba bo'i bsgrub par bya ba bzlog par bya ba dang ngo //
translated: “That” refers to the object of the verb, the thing to be negated.

original: gang gi phyir skabs su gyur ba'i ma grub ba bsgrub bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i rgyu des na'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skabs su gyur ba'i ma grub ba bsgrub bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i rgyu des na'o //
translated: “Because” means that the reason why the unestablished is the object to be established is that it is the occasion.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni shes byed kyi skabs la mi ltos na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni shes byed kyi skabs la mi ltos na'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means that it does not depend on the occasion of the proof.

original: gzhung gang gis dper brjod snyam na /
analyzed: gzhung gang gis dper brjod snyam na /
translated: What is the text that is the example?

original: de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Thus” is the text.

original: grangs can la ltos nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: grangs can la ltos nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In relation to the Sāṃkhya” means

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad bar can gyi bum pa ni grangs can la ma grub ste /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad bar can gyi bum pa ni grangs can la ma grub ste /
translated: a pot that has the distinction of impermanence is not established for the Sāṃkhya.

original: des na dpe ma grub ba yin no //
analyzed: des na dpe ma grub ba yin no //
translated: Therefore the example is not established.

original: mig gis gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa'o //🔽nam mkha' mi rtag pa nyid du ma grub pa ni dpe ma grub pa yang yin te /
analyzed: mig gis gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa'o // nam mkha' mi rtag pa nyid du ma grub pa ni dpe ma grub pa yang yin te /
translated: “Because it is apprehended by the eye” is an unestablished reason.

original: rigs pa can gyi lugs kyis nam mkha'i ni rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: rigs pa can gyi lugs kyis nam mkha'i ni rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro /
translated: “Impermanence is not established” is an example that is not established because, according to the Nyāya system, space is permanent.

original: // /'on te zhes bya ba ni rnam 'grel la 'jug ba'o //
analyzed: // /'on te zhes bya ba ni rnam 'grel la 'jug ba'o //
translated: But is the introduction to the Pramanavarttika.

original: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub par bya ba thams cad dam bca' bar thal ba ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub par bya ba thams cad dam bca' bar thal ba ma yin te zhes 'brel to //
translated: It is not the case that all the examples and reasons are to be established as consequences of the thesis.

original: 'o na dam bca' pa nyid gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na dam bca' pa nyid gang yin zhe na /
translated: What then is the thesis?

original: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But is the answer.

original: las gang la khyad par du 'phags pa yod pa de ni dam bca' ba yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: las gang la khyad par du 'phags pa yod pa de ni dam bca' ba yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: That which has a superior function is the thesis.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: las la bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: las la bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because the function is the activity.

original: 'on te sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yang las kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa yang las kho na'o snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the very thing that is taught as the proof is the function,

original: las kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: las kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the answer is the function is also.

original: 'on kyang ste de yang phyugs 'dod kho na'o snyam na //
analyzed: 'on kyang ste de yang phyugs 'dod kho na'o snyam na //
translated: But if you think that that also is only for the sake of the cow,

original: par byed pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: par byed pa nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the answer is the very thing that is the proof.

original: ci lta bur zhe na dper na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci lta bur zhe na dper na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is it like? The answer is for example.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni 'o ma za ba'i bya bas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni 'o ma za ba'i bya bas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the explanation: by the activity of drinking milk.

original: phyis 'gyur ba'i bsgrub par bya ba la ltos nas kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phyis 'gyur ba'i bsgrub par bya ba la ltos nas kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Also, with respect to the object to be established that is to be changed later, it is not the object to be established.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is just like that.

original: 'dod par 'gyur ba ni sgrub byed ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod par 'gyur ba ni sgrub byed ma grub pa'o //
translated: The desire is that the proof is not established.

original: grub pa'i mtha' rnam pa bzhi po rgyud thams cad pa dang zhes bya ba 'dir /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' rnam pa bzhi po rgyud thams cad pa dang zhes bya ba 'dir /
translated: The four kinds of tenets are: universal,🔽in the treatise on logic,

original: rigs pa'i mdo las /🔽rgyud thams cad dang mi 'gal ba rgyud kyi dbang du byas pa'i don ni /
analyzed: rigs pa'i mdo las / rgyud thams cad dang mi 'gal ba rgyud kyi dbang du byas pa'i don ni /
translated: it says:🔽“The meaning that is not in conflict with any treatise is the meaning of the treatise.”

original: rgyud thams cad pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yin no zhes so //
analyzed: rgyud thams cad pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yin no zhes so //
translated: It is the tenet of the universal treatise.🔽Also, in the explanation of logic,

original: rigs pa'i bshad pa las kyang /
analyzed: rigs pa'i bshad pa las kyang /
translated: it says:

original: dper na snom pa la sogs pa rnams ni dbang po dri la sogs pa'i dbang po'i don sa la sogs pa ni 'byung ba tshad mas ni gzhal bya 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba lta bu zhes so //
analyzed: dper na snom pa la sogs pa rnams ni dbang po dri la sogs pa'i dbang po'i don sa la sogs pa ni 'byung ba tshad mas ni gzhal bya 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba lta bu zhes so //
translated: “For example, the sense objects of smell and so on are the objects of the sense faculties of smell and so on. The elements are measured by valid cognition. The object is apprehended.”

original: mi mthun pa'i rgyud kyi grub pa'i mtha' yang rigs pa'i mdo las spyi'i rgyud du grub pa dang gzhan gyi rgyud du ma grub pa ni /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i rgyud kyi grub pa'i mtha' yang rigs pa'i mdo las spyi'i rgyud du grub pa dang gzhan gyi rgyud du ma grub pa ni /
translated: The tenets of a dissimilar continuum are also mentioned in the Sūtra on Valid Knowledge:🔽The establishment in a general continuum and the nonestablishment in another continuum

original: mi mthun pa'i rgyud kyi grub pa'i mtha'o zhes so //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i rgyud kyi grub pa'i mtha'o zhes so //
translated: are the tenets of a dissimilar continuum.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /🔽mtshungs pa'i rgyud @115a * //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te / mtshungs pa'i rgyud @115a * //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.🔽The meaning of establishment in a similar continuum is that other things are established in a continuum.

original: du grub pa'i don gzhan rnams kyang rgyud du ma grub pa ni mi mthun pa'i rgyud kyi grub ba'i mtha' zhes brjod do //
analyzed: du grub pa'i don gzhan rnams kyang rgyud du ma grub pa ni mi mthun pa'i rgyud kyi grub ba'i mtha' zhes brjod do //
translated: The nonestablishment in a continuum is called the tenets of a dissimilar continuum.

original: dper na rigs pa'i bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i don de dang mtshungs pa byed brag pa'i lung las grub pa /
analyzed: dper na rigs pa'i bstan bcos dang 'gal ba'i don de dang mtshungs pa byed brag pa'i lung las grub pa /
translated: For example, a meaning that is contradictory to a treatise on logic is established in the scriptures of the Vaiśeṣikas,

original: sangs rgyas pa'i lung du ma grub pa bzhin no //🔽dbang du byed ba'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid kyang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas pa'i lung du ma grub pa bzhin no // dbang du byed ba'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid kyang /
translated: but is not established in the scriptures of the Buddhists.🔽The definition of the tenets of a controlling continuum is

original: gang grub na skabs gzhan 'grub pa ni dbang du byed pa'i rgyud yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: gang grub na skabs gzhan 'grub pa ni dbang du byed pa'i rgyud yin no zhe'o //
translated: that which is established when another part is established is a controlling continuum.

original: khas blangs ba'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid kyang yongs sum brtags pa khas blangs pa las de'i byad pa yongs su rtog pa ni khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'o zhes so //
analyzed: khas blangs ba'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid kyang yongs sum brtags pa khas blangs pa las de'i byad pa yongs su rtog pa ni khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'o zhes so //
translated: The investigation of its characteristics is a philosophical tenet that is accepted.

original: 'dir yang rigs pa'i rnam par bshad pa las don gyi rigs 'ga' zhig ma brtags par khas blangs pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang rigs pa'i rnam par bshad pa las don gyi rigs 'ga' zhig ma brtags par khas blangs pa ste /
translated: Here, in the Rational System of Exposition, some types of objects are accepted without being investigated.

original: dper na sgra ni rdzas yin te de ci rtag ba yin nam /
analyzed: dper na sgra ni rdzas yin te de ci rtag ba yin nam /
translated: For example, sound is a substance. Is it permanent or impermanent?

original: 'on te mi rtag pa yin zhes ba bya ba lta bur rdzas yod pa'i khyad par mi rtag ba dang / rtag pa yongs su rtog pa de ni khas blangs ba'i grub pa'i mtha' yin no zhe'o //🔽de ltar rgyud thams cad la sogs pa rnam ba bzhi'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa yin zhes ba bya ba lta bur rdzas yod pa'i khyad par mi rtag ba dang / rtag pa yongs su rtog pa de ni khas blangs ba'i grub pa'i mtha' yin no zhe'o // de ltar rgyud thams cad la sogs pa rnam ba bzhi'i tshul gyis /
translated: The investigation of the distinction of being a substance and the distinction of being either permanent or impermanent is a philosophical tenet that is accepted.

original: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni /
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni /
translated: Thus, the definition of a philosophical tenet that is accepted is taught by way of the four modes, such as all continuums.

original: dam bca' ba yin no zhes pa'i mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir te byas pa'i phyir ro //🔽skyon med do zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba yin no zhes pa'i mtshan nyid bsgrub pa'i phyir te byas pa'i phyir ro // skyon med do zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi'o //
translated: The definition of a thesis is: that which is to be established because it is asserted.🔽The definition of a reason is: that which is to be established because it is a part of a proof.

original: sgrub par byed ba'i yan lag yin pa bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed ba'i yan lag yin pa bsgrub bya yin no zhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not correct to say that the definition of a thesis is: that which is to be established because it is a part of a proof.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang / ma bstan pa thams cad kyang ma grub ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang / ma bstan pa thams cad kyang ma grub ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all that is taught as a proof and all that is not taught are not established.🔽Why?

original: gang gi phyir grub mtha' nyid du mtshungs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir grub mtha' nyid du mtshungs te /
translated: Because the tenets are the same.

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag la ni khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i nyid mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe dag la ni khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i nyid mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The reason and example that are not established have the same tenets as those that are established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de yang zhes smos te /🔽ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa yang khas blangs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: de yang zhes smos te / ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa yang khas blangs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Because they are also🔽the reason and example that are not established.

original: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The definition of a thesis is the same as the definition of a tenet that is accepted.

original: gzhan yang yan lag lnga las zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod ba'i lan brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang yan lag lnga las zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod ba'i lan brjod pa ni /
translated: Moreover, the response to the dispute, “from the five parts,” etc.,

original: sngar ma grub pa'i zhes smos te /
analyzed: sngar ma grub pa'i zhes smos te /
translated: is stated, “prior to the establishment of . . .

original: thams cad 'brel to //
analyzed: thams cad 'brel to //
translated: ” All of this is connected.

original: yan lag thams cad mtshan nyid brjod pa'i sngon rol du ma grub ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i de'i yul spangs pas ni dam bca'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad mtshan nyid brjod pa'i sngon rol du ma grub ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i de'i yul spangs pas ni dam bca'i mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: Since the object of that is abandoned, the definition of a promise is not the nature of that which is not established prior to the expression of the character of all the parts.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa'i gtan tshigs des na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa'i gtan tshigs des na /
translated: Since that is the reason,

original: las la sogs ba yi khyad par nye bar bkod pa'i lan des rnam 'byed ces bya ba la ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pas bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes rnam par 'byed pa ni /
analyzed: las la sogs ba yi khyad par nye bar bkod pa'i lan des rnam 'byed ces bya ba la ni sgrub par byed pa ma yin pas bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes rnam par 'byed pa ni /
translated: the response that the particulars of action, etc., are adduced is not a proof, since it is the probandum. The analysis is:

original: ci ltar yang @115b nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ltar yang @115b nus pa ma yin no //
translated: how could it be possible?

original: 'dis ni rtsod ba dang po gnyis bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rtsod ba dang po gnyis bsal ba yin no //
translated: This resolves the first two disputes.

original: rtsod ba tha ma sel bas rnam 'grel dang po'i rkang ba dang po rnam 'grel gnyis ba'i phyir phyi ma dang bcas te rnam bar 'grel ba ni /
analyzed: rtsod ba tha ma sel bas rnam 'grel dang po'i rkang ba dang po rnam 'grel gnyis ba'i phyir phyi ma dang bcas te rnam bar 'grel ba ni /
translated: The commentary on the first line of the first chapter of the Pramanavarttika, which is the second chapter of the Pramanavarttika, is as follows:

original: grub mtha' ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: grub mtha' ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The treatise is called

original: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' ni'o //🔽ma grub pa thams cad ces bya ba ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa'o //🔽khas len pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yin pa nyid gsal bar byed ba ni /
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' ni'o // ma grub pa thams cad ces bya ba ni gtan tshigs ma grub pa la sogs pa'o // khas len pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro // khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yin pa nyid gsal bar byed ba ni /
translated: Pramanavarttika.🔽The treatise is called Pramanavarttika because it elucidates the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.

original: bstan bcos las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.

original: gal te khas blangs ba'i grub pa'i mtha' nyid yin yang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa ci ltar bsgrub byar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: gal te khas blangs ba'i grub pa'i mtha' nyid yin yang ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs la sogs pa ci ltar bsgrub byar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.🔽The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.

original: de zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The tenets that are accepted are the tenets that are accepted.

original: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs pa la sogs pa de dang por sgrub byed nyid du khas blangs kyang phyis phyir rgol bas /
analyzed: ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs pa la sogs pa de dang por sgrub byed nyid du khas blangs kyang phyis phyir rgol bas /
translated: The reason, etc. that are not established are first accepted as the proof, but later, the opponent

original: sgrub byed 'di ma grub pas na ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba 'di las rtogs par 'gyur zhes brgal zhing brtags pa na /
analyzed: sgrub byed 'di ma grub pas na ci ltar bsgrub par bya ba 'di las rtogs par 'gyur zhes brgal zhing brtags pa na /
translated: argues and analyzes, saying, “Since this proof is not established, how could the probandum be understood from it?”

original: sgrub par byed pa de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro des na gdon mi bra par bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas len par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa de bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'gyur ro des na gdon mi bra par bsgrub par bya ba nyid du khas len par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Then the proof becomes the probandum itself. Therefore, it is inevitable that one accepts the proof as the probandum.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na ma grub pa ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na ma grub pa ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: Why? He says, “That which is not established.”

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba ni ma grub pa kho na yin la /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba ni ma grub pa kho na yin la /
translated: If the probandum is not established,🔽then is it not the case that the accepted tenet is only present?

original: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yang da ltar ba kho nar ma yin nam zhes dogs ba bsu nas brjod pa ni /🔽bya ba'i rkyen zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yang da ltar ba kho nar ma yin nam zhes dogs ba bsu nas brjod pa ni / bya ba'i rkyen zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In response to this qualm, he says,🔽“The condition of action.”

original: sgrub par bya ba'i sgra ni bya ba'i rkyen gyi mtha' can yin la /
analyzed: sgrub par bya ba'i sgra ni bya ba'i rkyen gyi mtha' can yin la /
translated: The word “probandum” has the suffix of the condition of action.

original: bya ba'i rkyen yang dus gsum la 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i rkyen yang dus gsum la 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The condition of action also changes in the three times.

original: de bzhin du khas blangs ba'i sgra yang dus gsum la 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du khas blangs ba'i sgra yang dus gsum la 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, the word “promise” also applies in the three times.

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bstan pa dang ma bstan pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du nye bar bstan pa dang ma bstan pa'o //
translated: “ All” refers to what is taught and what is not taught as being the proof.

original: de ltar rtsod pa tha ma bsal nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtsod pa tha ma bsal nas /
translated: Having thus cleared up the final objection,

original: rtsod pa bar pa sel ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa bar pa sel ba ni 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the middle objection is cleared up by “Or else.”

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i tshig nyid kyis grub pa'i rang bzhin bkag pa'i phyir nam grub pa'i sgrub par byed ba la sogs pa ni dam bca' ba nyid ma yin zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo'i tshig nyid kyis grub pa'i rang bzhin bkag pa'i phyir nam grub pa'i sgrub par byed ba la sogs pa ni dam bca' ba nyid ma yin zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i don to //
translated: The point of the objection is that since the words of the intrinsic nature of the probandum are established by themselves, the intrinsic nature is refuted, and therefore the established proof, etc., are not the thesis.

original: lan ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “That also.”

original: 'dis ni bsgrub bya'i yan lag ces mi rung zhes bya ba de rnam par bkral ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni bsgrub bya'i yan lag ces mi rung zhes bya ba de rnam par bkral ba yin no //
translated: This explains the unsuitability of “the part of the probandum.”

original: des bstan par bya ba'i don ma grub pa'i phyir na yan lag gi mtshan nyid thams cad ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des bstan par bya ba'i don ma grub pa'i phyir na yan lag gi mtshan nyid thams cad ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the meaning that is to be established by that is not established, all the characteristics of the parts are not established.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When?

original: mtshan nyid sgrub pa'i sngon rol du'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid sgrub pa'i sngon rol du'o //
translated: Prior to the establishment of the characteristics.

original: thams cad ces bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang ma bstan pa thams @116a * //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dang ma bstan pa thams @116a * //
translated: All means that all that is taught as the proof and that which is not taught

original: cad dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: cad dam bca' bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: would be the thesis.

original: gal te sgrub par byed pa bstan pa yang dam bca' ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed pa bstan pa yang dam bca' ba yin na /
translated: If the teaching of the proof is the thesis,

original: 'o na gang gis de'i mtshan nyid don dang bcas par 'gyur ba sgrub par byed pa nyid gang zhig yin zhen /
analyzed: 'o na gang gis de'i mtshan nyid don dang bcas par 'gyur ba sgrub par byed pa nyid gang zhig yin zhen /
translated: then what is the proof that would make the characteristic of that meaningful?

original: de las ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de las ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: That which is not excluded from that means

original: dam bca' ba las ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba las ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: that which is not excluded from the thesis.

original: grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: The teaching of the proof that is established is the proof.

original: thams cad ni zhes bya ba'i kyang gi sgra rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad ni zhes bya ba'i kyang gi sgra rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The word “all” is explained by the word “also.”

original: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Or means “alternatively.”

original: ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa dam bca' ba ma yin pa'i 'thad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'o na ni zhes bya ba ni /🔽ma grub pa'i grub par byed pa la sogs pa brgyal bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa dam bca' ba ma yin pa'i 'thad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to // 'o na ni zhes bya ba ni / ma grub pa'i grub par byed pa la sogs pa brgyal bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.

original: brgya la ni mi 'gyur ba yang srid do zhes the tshom du 'gyur ro //🔽dam bca' ba yang nges pa nyid du bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: brgya la ni mi 'gyur ba yang srid do zhes the tshom du 'gyur ro // dam bca' ba yang nges pa nyid du bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.

original: de yang the tshom yod na mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'o //🔽lan brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yang the tshom yod na mi 'grub po zhes bya ba'o // lan brjod pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.

original: des na the tshom gyi skabs med do //🔽de ltar rtsod pa gnyis bsal nas /🔽rtsod pa dang po rjes su brjod pa ni /
analyzed: des na the tshom gyi skabs med do // de ltar rtsod pa gnyis bsal nas / rtsod pa dang po rjes su brjod pa ni /
translated: If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //🔽ci ltar nus min zhes bya ba la sogs pa don gyi rnam par 'grel pa na /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o // ci ltar nus min zhes bya ba la sogs pa don gyi rnam par 'grel pa na /
translated: If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.🔽If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.

original: lan 'debs pa ni 'di ni med do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan 'debs pa ni 'di ni med do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is not established, then the establishment of the thesis is doubtful.

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid 'dod pa'i shugs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid 'dod pa'i shugs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'brel to //
translated: because the force of desire to accomplish is the cause.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: thabs nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thabs nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By the very means.

original: gal te sgrub par byed pa gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs na ni /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed pa gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs na ni /
translated: If the means were not accomplished by another,

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the teaching of the means would not be the means.

original: 'on te de ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir na phyugs 'dod nyid ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te de ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir na phyugs 'dod nyid ma yin no snyam na /
translated: But if it is thought that the means is not the desire to accomplish because it is taught as the means,

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ste byed pa'i phyugs 'dod ces bya bar ro //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ste byed pa'i phyugs 'dod ces bya bar ro //
translated: here the means is the desire to accomplish.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i rkyen ni ta ma'i rkyen no //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i rkyen ni ta ma'i rkyen no //
translated: The special condition is the condition of the tam.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mdo'i rnam par dbye ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni mdo gcig yin la /
analyzed: mdo'i rnam par dbye ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni mdo gcig yin la /
translated: The desire to accomplish is one sutra.

original: 'dod ba'i phugs zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod ba'i phugs zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yin pa ste /
translated: The desire to accomplish is the second.

original: 'di gnyis las gcig lus pa'i phyir na 'dod pa'i phugs zhes bya ba'i mdo yin no //
analyzed: 'di gnyis las gcig lus pa'i phyir na 'dod pa'i phugs zhes bya ba'i mdo yin no //
translated: Because one of these two remains, it is the sutra called the desire to accomplish.

original: da ltar 'dod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: da ltar 'dod pa yin gyi /
translated: Now, it is desire,

original: 'dod par 'gyur ba ni las ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa ni mi rigs so zhes smras pa ni /
analyzed: 'dod par 'gyur ba ni las ma yin no zhes gang brjod pa ni mi rigs so zhes smras pa ni /
translated: and not the action, that is the cause of the effect.

original: byung ba'i zhes bya ba'i 'dod phugs zhes bya ba der ro //
analyzed: byung ba'i zhes bya ba'i 'dod phugs zhes bya ba der ro //
translated: The word “now” is the conclusion of the desire.

original: gtsug lag ces bya ba ni gtso bo'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag ces bya ba ni gtso bo'o //
translated: “ Scripture” is the principal.

original: ci'i phyir gtso bo ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gtso bo ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not the principal?

original: re lde dag tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: re lde dag tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ In a fence” is the object.

original: byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dod par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir byung ba'i rkyen gtso bo ma yin no //
analyzed: byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dod par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir byung ba'i rkyen gtso bo ma yin no //
translated: “ It is produced” is the desire. Therefore, the condition of desire is not the principal.

original: re lde dag tu zhes bya ba dang re lde rnams su bya @116b bar yang 'dod pa'i phyir gcig gi tshig kyang gtso bo ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: re lde dag tu zhes bya ba dang re lde rnams su bya @116b bar yang 'dod pa'i phyir gcig gi tshig kyang gtso bo ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: “ In a fence” and “in fences” are the object. Therefore, the word “one” is not the principal.

original: 'on te sgrub byed ma grub pa la sogs pa ni bas blangs pa'i grub ba'i mtha' ma yin pa'i phyir na dam bca' ba'i don ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te sgrub byed ma grub pa la sogs pa ni bas blangs pa'i grub ba'i mtha' ma yin pa'i phyir na dam bca' ba'i don ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the unestablished proof, etc., are not the meaning of the thesis because they are not the accepted conclusion,

original: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i grub pa'i mtha' yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the accepted conclusion is also not the meaning of the thesis.

original: 'di la ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed ba la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed ba la sogs pa la'o //
translated: Here, the proof is not established, etc.

original: de yang grub pa'i mtha' ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de yang grub pa'i mtha' ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin pa kho na'o //
translated: And that has already been taught by “The tenet, etc.”

original: rigs pa'i mdo'i sun 'byin pa mjug sdud pa ni /
analyzed: rigs pa'i mdo'i sun 'byin pa mjug sdud pa ni /
translated: The conclusion of the refutation of the Sūnyatāsaptati is:

original: des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Therefore, etc.”

original: de ltar dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid la ha cang khyab ba'i nyes pas nyes chags pa yin no zhes bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid la ha cang khyab ba'i nyes pas nyes chags pa yin no zhes bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught that the definition of the thesis is flawed by the fault of overextension,

original: mtshan nyid sun dbyung ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni 'dir zhes bya ba ste dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid la'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid sun dbyung ba'i phyir rnam par rtog pa ni 'dir zhes bya ba ste dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid la'o //
translated: in order to refute the definition, he says, “The conceptualization here, etc.” is with regard to the definition of the thesis.

original: chos sam chos can nam /
analyzed: chos sam chos can nam /
translated: It is either a property or a subject

original: tshogs pa zhig bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa zhig bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: or a collection that is to be established.🔽It is to be signified.

original: mtshon par bya bar yin par 'gyur grang na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon par bya bar yin par 'gyur grang na zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is the conceptualization.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa de rnams kyi nang nas so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa de rnams kyi nang nas so //
translated: “From that,” from among those conceptualizations,

original: chos bsgrub par bya bar khas len na chos mthun pa zhes bya ba dpe'i mtshan nyid med de dpe 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos bsgrub par bya bar khas len na chos mthun pa zhes bya ba dpe'i mtshan nyid med de dpe 'gal lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the property is to be established, then there is no example that illustrates the property to be established, because the example is contradictory.

original: 'on te chos can bsgrub bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on te chos can bsgrub bar bya ba yin na /
translated: But if the subject is to be established,

original: de'i tshe gtan tshigs don med de /
analyzed: de'i tshe gtan tshigs don med de /
translated: then the reason is pointless,

original: chos can grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the subject is already established.

original: tshogs pas bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni /
analyzed: tshogs pas bsgrub par bya ba yin na ni /
translated: If the collection is to be established,

original: phyogs gnyi ga las byung ba'i nyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni don gyis 'thob po //
analyzed: phyogs gnyi ga las byung ba'i nyes par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni don gyis 'thob po //
translated: then the fault that arises from both positions is implied.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: “ If” means “as explained.”

original: de zhes bya ba ni chos so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni chos so //
translated: “ That” means the property.

original: de ltar yin na ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar yin na ci skyon snyam na /
translated: If that is so, what is the fault?

original: smras pa de ltar na zhes bya ba ste chos bsgrub par bya ba yin na /🔽de'i chos yod pa zhes bya ba'i bsgrub par bya ba de'i chos ni de'i chos so //
analyzed: smras pa de ltar na zhes bya ba ste chos bsgrub par bya ba yin na / de'i chos yod pa zhes bya ba'i bsgrub par bya ba de'i chos ni de'i chos so //
translated: It is said, “In that case,” if the property is to be established.🔽The property of that is the property of the probandum.

original: de yod pa ni de dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de yod pa ni de dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Its existence is its possession.

original: de skad du rigs pa'i rnam par bshad pa las bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mtshungs pa ste chos mthun pas so //
analyzed: de skad du rigs pa'i rnam par bshad pa las bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mtshungs pa ste chos mthun pas so //
translated: Thus, in the logical explanation, it is established by the property of the probandum, that is, by the similar property.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa'i rgyus de'i chos yod pa ni dpe yin no zhes so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa'i rgyus de'i chos yod pa ni dpe yin no zhes so //
translated: The example is the existence of that property by the cause of the property of the probandum.

original: ci ltar na dpe'i mtshan nyid zhugs snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar na dpe'i mtshan nyid zhugs snyam na /
translated: How does it enter the definition of the example?

original: gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By what?

original: de'i chos yod par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag ba nyid kyis chos skye ba dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de yod pa ste bum pa la sogs pa gang la yod pa zhes tshig sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i chos yod par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba mi rtag ba nyid kyis chos skye ba dang ldan pa nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de yod pa ste bum pa la sogs pa gang la yod pa zhes tshig sbyar ro //
translated: The existence of that property means the existence of the probandum's property, such as being impermanent and having arising, etc., which exists in a vase, etc. This is how the sentence is constructed.

original: chos rnams ni chos kyi rten yin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos rnams ni chos kyi rten yin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it is impossible for properties to be the basis of properties. This is the meaning.

original: 'dis ni chos bsgrub bya na chos mthun med ces bya ba gang yin pa de rnam par bkrol ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos bsgrub bya na chos mthun med ces bya ba gang yin pa de rnam par bkrol ba yin no //
translated: This explains what is meant by When the property is the probandum, there is no similar property.

original: lhag ma rnam par 'grel pa ni chos can zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnam par 'grel pa ni chos can zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the remainder is the subject matter.

original: don gyis 'thob pa brjod pa ni /
analyzed: don gyis 'thob pa brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of the actual point is:

original: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “But if” is the question.

original: @117a * // gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam 'grel la 'jug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: @117a * // gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam 'grel la 'jug par byed pa'o //
translated: “If” and so on introduce the commentary.

original: 'on te phyogs gnyi ga las gyur ba'i nyes pa ci ltar spong zhen /
analyzed: 'on te phyogs gnyi ga las gyur ba'i nyes pa ci ltar spong zhen /
translated: But how does one avoid the fault of both positions?

original: tshogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The collection” is the answer.

original: de'i zhes bya ba gnyi ga'i chos so //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba gnyi ga'i chos so //
translated: “That” refers to the property of both.

original: ci ltar mi 'byor snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar mi 'byor snyam na /
translated: How is it not applicable?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In this way” is the answer.

original: gnyis po zhes bya ba ni chos can dang chos so //
analyzed: gnyis po zhes bya ba ni chos can dang chos so //
translated: “The two” refers to the subject and the property.

original: 'gyur mod ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: 'gyur mod ci skyon snyam na /
translated: “So what?” is the question.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The probandum” is the answer.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par can no //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par can no //
translated: “In that way” refers to the particular probandum property.

original: sgra la ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can gyi chos kyi gtan tshigs grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra la ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyi khyad par can gyi chos can gyi chos kyi gtan tshigs grub pa ma yin no //
translated: The property of the subject, which is a particular probandum property, is not established as the reason in regard to sound.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: “By impermanence” is the question.

original: sngar ni sgrub par byed pa skye ba can la sogs pas chos mtshungs pa med do zhes bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: sngar ni sgrub par byed pa skye ba can la sogs pas chos mtshungs pa med do zhes bstan pa yin la /
translated: Previously, it was shown that the reason is not similar to the property to be established, since it is produced, etc.

original: da lta ni bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par can gyi chos can gyi yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no //
analyzed: da lta ni bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par can gyi chos can gyi yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad par yin no //
translated: Now, the difference is that it is the subject that is qualified by the property to be established.

original: tshogs pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi'o //
translated: The word “collection” is used by others.

original: ci ltar tshogs pa'i sgra yan lag la 'jug snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar tshogs pa'i sgra yan lag la 'jug snyam na /
translated: How is the word “collection” applied to the parts?

original: tshogs pa la 'jug pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa la 'jug pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is applied to the collection.

original: bstan bcos kyis ci bya ba ni /
analyzed: bstan bcos kyis ci bya ba ni /
translated: What is the purpose of the treatise?

original: gal te bstan bcos byed pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'grigs pas 'chad pa bo nyid kyis bcos nas bshad par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te bstan bcos byed pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'grigs pas 'chad pa bo nyid kyis bcos nas bshad par bya ba yin na /
translated: If the definition of the treatise is not correct, and the author himself must correct it,

original: de'i tshe des byas pa'i mtshan nyid med pa kho nar rtogs par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: de'i tshe des byas pa'i mtshan nyid med pa kho nar rtogs par 'gyur mod /
translated: then it is understood that it has no definition created by him.

original: bstan bcos kyis ci bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bstan bcos kyis ci bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the purpose of the treatise? This is the meaning.

original: ci ltar gnyis pa brjod pa mi 'grigs pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan du bshad par bya ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ci ltar gnyis pa brjod pa mi 'grigs pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan du bshad par bya ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the second statement is explained as having an incorrect definition,

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i tshul nyes par byas pa yang gzhan du brtag par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i tshul nyes par byas pa yang gzhan du brtag par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The method of reasoning, etc. is also to be examined elsewhere.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: mi srid pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: mi srid pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is impossible.

original: mtshan nyid kyis bstan par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyis bstan par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is taught by means of a definition.

original: mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar byas pa de ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don ston par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar byas pa de ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don ston par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the definition as it is made does not teach the meaning that is intended to be expressed.

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni /
translated: He clarifies just that:

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //🔽de nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o // de nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: How?

original: rigs pa can la sogs pa la brjod ba nyid do //
analyzed: rigs pa can la sogs pa la brjod ba nyid do //
translated: The meaning is that it is expressed in the Vaiśeṣika, etc.

original: phyogs kyi rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni gtso po nyid do //
analyzed: phyogs kyi rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni gtso po nyid do //
translated: The nature of the position is the chief nature.

original: de zhes bya ba shes par 'dod pa'i bye phrag dang ldan pa'i chos can chos so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba shes par 'dod pa'i bye phrag dang ldan pa'i chos can chos so //
translated: The property of the subject that is known as “that” is the property of the subject that possesses the quality of being a hundred.

original: de'i tshe ci ltar phyogs 'dir nye bar btags pa yin te ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ci ltar phyogs 'dir nye bar btags pa yin te ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: At that time, how is it designated in this position? It is not at all.

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: If, etc. is another.

original: de ni tshogs pa'i'o //
analyzed: de ni tshogs pa'i'o //
translated: That is the collection.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o //
translated: “This” refers to the assemblage.

original: 'o na ci ltar de phyogs nyid yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar de phyogs nyid yin snyam na /
translated: But how can that be a “position”?

original: bsgrub bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “That which is to be established” is the object.

original: 'di ni tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni tshogs pa'o //
translated: “This” refers to the assemblage.

original: de ltar yang gsungs so zhes 'brel te /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs so zhes 'brel te /
translated: “Thus it is said” connects this with the previous passage.

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos gsungs @117b pa'o //
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos gsungs @117b pa'o //
translated: The master Dignāga said this.

original: ci skad gsungs snyam na /
analyzed: ci skad gsungs snyam na /
translated: What did he say?

original: de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In that case . . . ”

original: 'on te grub kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te grub kyang bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: But if it is maintained that even though it is established, it is still to be established,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If” means:🔽

original: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba la the tshom za ba'i chos can gyi chos nyid kyi tshe yang ci ltar mi 'grub par 'gyur te grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba la the tshom za ba'i chos can gyi chos nyid kyi tshe yang ci ltar mi 'grub par 'gyur te grub pa kho na'o //
translated: Then, even when the subject is in doubt as to what is to be established, how could the property of the subject not be established? It would have to be established.

original: tshogs pa ma grub kyang phyogs kyi chos nyid ni gtso bo'i tshul du grub pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tshogs pa ma grub kyang phyogs kyi chos nyid ni gtso bo'i tshul du grub pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even if the assemblage is not established, the property of the subject is established as the primary mode. This is the meaning.

original: gal te slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i chos can nyid phyogs su bzhed na /
analyzed: gal te slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i chos can nyid phyogs su bzhed na /
translated: If the master Dignaga accepts the subject as a property-possessor that is doubtful with regard to the property to be established,

original: 'on ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on ci ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: then what is the point of the words if it is not a case of superimposition?

original: nye bar btags pa ma yin na ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: nye bar btags pa ma yin na ci skyon snyam na /
translated: If you think, What is the problem if it is not a case of superimposition?

original: chos can chos zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: chos can chos zhes gsungs so /
translated: he says, The subject and the property.

original: dpe'i chos can gyi chos kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpe'i chos can gyi chos kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the property of the example would also be a reason.

original: gang zhig spang ba'i don du nye bar btags pa byed pa'i rtsod pa de gang yin snyam na /
analyzed: gang zhig spang ba'i don du nye bar btags pa byed pa'i rtsod pa de gang yin snyam na /
translated: If you think, What is the argument for which superimposition is made in order to eliminate it?

original: 'dir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: he says, Here.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin dpyod pa las rang bzhin ba sgrub par bya ba'i blo de med pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin dpyod pa las rang bzhin ba sgrub par bya ba'i blo de med pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the cognition that establishes the property of the subject does not exist due to the analysis of the nature of the proof.

original: de'i phyir phyogs chos ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyogs chos ni gtan tshigs yin no zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the definition the property of the subject is the reason would not be correct.

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Anticipating this doubt,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: he says, with regard to the probandum.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin dpyod pa'i dus na ni bsgrub par bya ba des pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin dpyod pa'i dus na ni bsgrub par bya ba des pa ma yin gyi /
translated: When the nature of the probandum is being examined, the probandum is not certain.

original: 'on kyang the tshom za ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang the tshom za ba yin te /
translated: But rather, it is doubtful.

original: des na gtan tshigs 'jug pa nyams pa med do zhes bya bar sems na'o //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs 'jug pa nyams pa med do zhes bya bar sems na'o //
translated: Therefore, you think that the application of the reason is not impaired.

original: nges pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because there is no certainty,

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di ni med de //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba zhes bya ba'i nges pa 'di ni med de //
translated: there is no certainty called “doubt about the property to be established.”

original: the tshom du gyur pa yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma yin par yang 'gyur ba yin no //🔽the tshom du gyur pa bsgrub par bya ba des pa nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa yang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ma yin par yang 'gyur ba yin no // the tshom du gyur pa bsgrub par bya ba des pa nyid ston pa ni /
translated: And that which is doubtful is not the property to be established.

original: the tshom za ba la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: the tshom za ba la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The demonstration that that which is doubtful is not the property to be established is🔽“If there is doubt about . . .”

original: lan nim yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan nim yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “No.”

original: gang dang gang the tshom du gyur bde dang de la gtan tshigs 'jug pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang dang gang the tshom du gyur bde dang de la gtan tshigs 'jug pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no certainty that the application of the reason is only to that which is doubtful.

original: 'o na ci ltar gtan tshigs the tshom la brjod phyir zhes gsungs she na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar gtan tshigs the tshom la brjod phyir zhes gsungs she na /
translated: Well then, why did he say, “because the reason is stated for the sake of doubt”?

original: grub pa dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: grub pa dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: He said, “because of the establishment of the thesis.”

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni nges ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni nges ba dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is clarified by the words, “because of the ascertainment of the thesis.”

original: 'di ga las shen /
analyzed: 'di ga las shen /
translated: Why is this?

original: rim pa ci lta bar gtan tshigs gnyis brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rim pa ci lta bar gtan tshigs gnyis brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of the two reasons in this order is

original: bsgrub bya nges pa la dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang / bsal pa la ni mi nus pa'i phyir ro //🔽the tshom du gyur ba la gtan tshigs 'jug pa nyid kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya nges pa la dgos pa med pa'i phyir dang / bsal pa la ni mi nus pa'i phyir ro // the tshom du gyur ba la gtan tshigs 'jug pa nyid kyang ma yin la /
translated: because there is no need for the ascertainment of the thesis and because it is impossible to ascertain the elimination of the reason.🔽The reason does not apply to that which is doubtful.

original: the tshom du gyur pa nyid la 'jug pa yang ma @118a * //
analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa nyid la 'jug pa yang ma @118a * //
translated: Nor does it apply to that which is ascertained as doubtful,

original: yin te / the tshom mngon du gyur pa med kyang sgrub bar byed pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yin te / the tshom mngon du gyur pa med kyang sgrub bar byed pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the application of the proof is to that which is not manifest as doubtful.

original: de ltar rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba bsal nas mngon par 'dod pa'i mjug sdud pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa gnyi ga ltar yang phyogs kyi chos zhes bya ba bsal nas mngon par 'dod pa'i mjug sdud pa ni /
translated: Thus, having eliminated the so-called property of the subject in both ways, he concludes the desired point.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He says, “here.”

original: rung pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa la'o //
analyzed: rung pa ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa la'o //
translated: The opponent's objection is stated in the words it is not proper.

original: phyogs su gyur bzhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom du gyur pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: phyogs su gyur bzhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom du gyur pa'i chos can no //
translated: The subject is the subject of the proposition, which is in doubt as to the property to be established.

original: ci ltar chos can nyid ces bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar chos can nyid ces bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of the words subject is as follows.

original: the tshom du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par can du gyur pa'i chos can ni dngos po kho nar phyogs yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'di la gzhan dag ci ltar ma grub pa khyad par yin /
analyzed: the tshom du gyur pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par can du gyur pa'i chos can ni dngos po kho nar phyogs yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'di la gzhan dag ci ltar ma grub pa khyad par yin /
translated: The subject, which is in doubt as to the specific property to be established, is indeed an entity, and so is the subject. But how can not being established for the other be a qualification of it?

original: bsgrub par bya ba la yang ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba la yang ma grub pa yin te /
translated: It is not established for the one for whom the proposition is to be established.

original: des na ci ltar des khyad par du byas pa phyogs yin zhes log par rtogs pa yod do zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na ci ltar des khyad par du byas pa phyogs yin zhes log par rtogs pa yod do zhes bya ba'o //
translated: So how can it be the subject, qualified by that? This is the opponent's misconception.

original: lan brjod pa ni /🔽chos can yan lag la rtogs par 'gyur ba'i spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lan brjod pa ni / chos can yan lag la rtogs par 'gyur ba'i spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir te /
translated: The reply is stated:🔽Because the universal, which is understood in relation to the subject, is applied.

original: lhag par sgro btags pa'i phyir na chos can nyid phyogs yin no //
analyzed: lhag par sgro btags pa'i phyir na chos can nyid phyogs yin no //
translated: Because of the superimposition, the subject is the subject.

original: chos can la ni spyi'i rang bzhin gyi phyogs nye bar brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: chos can la ni spyi'i rang bzhin gyi phyogs nye bar brtags pa yin te /
