translated: The nature of the subject is imagined in general,

original: de ni ma 'ongs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ma 'ongs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is future.

original: bsgrub par bya ba la the tshom za pa'i chos can gyi rang bzhin ni nye bar btags pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba la the tshom za pa'i chos can gyi rang bzhin ni nye bar btags pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of the subject, which is doubted with regard to the probandum, is not imagined,

original: dngos po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a real entity.

original: phyogs de ni yod du zin kyang yal bar dor ba ni nye bar btags pa'i sgo nas rtsod pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs de ni yod du zin kyang yal bar dor ba ni nye bar btags pa'i sgo nas rtsod pa'i lan gdab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if that position exists, it is ignored, because the answer to the dispute is imagined.

original: gzhan gyi ltar gzhan la 'jug pa'i sgra gzhan la btags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ltar gzhan la 'jug pa'i sgra gzhan la btags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The word “other” does not refer to another in the sense of another school.

original: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is clarified by “if” .

original: de zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the collection .

original: lan ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste mi nye ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lan ni de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste mi nye ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The answer is “because of that very fact,” i.e., because of the non-proximity.

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
translated: “How?” is another question.

original: ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: ci zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: “What?” and so on is the answer.

original: gal te gang gis de skad brjod pa 'ga' zhig de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba la tha snyad byed pa mthong ngam snyam na /
analyzed: gal te gang gis de skad brjod pa 'ga' zhig de ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba la tha snyad byed pa mthong ngam snyam na /
translated: If you think that you see someone who speaks in this way, who uses such expressions in reference to something that exists in this way,

original: snal ma zhes bya ba'o //🔽de la zhes bya ba ni snal ma la ras yug chen btags so //
analyzed: snal ma zhes bya ba'o // de la zhes bya ba ni snal ma la ras yug chen btags so //
translated: then it is the threads.🔽In this case, the expression “in this” refers to the threads.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig la'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig la'o //
translated: The expression “in this” refers to the expression “the great cloth is in the threads.”

original: bsam pa gang snyam na /
analyzed: bsam pa gang snyam na /
translated: What is the meaning of “in this”?

original: ras zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ras zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is the cloth.

original: 'di la yang zhes bya ba ni bsam pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la yang zhes bya ba ni bsam pa la'o //
translated: The expression “in this” refers to the meaning.

original: don 'di la spyor ba ni /
analyzed: don 'di la spyor ba ni /
translated: The application of this meaning is as follows:

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In this way, in the same way, here also.”

original: gal te yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar gzhung 'dzugs na 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te yan lag la spyi nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de ltar gzhung 'dzugs na 'o na ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you establish the text in this way, saying, “Because the universal is figuratively designated in the parts,” then what is the meaning of “in this way”?

original: chos can tsam phyogs yin na tshig 'di 'thad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos can tsam phyogs yin na tshig 'di 'thad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that this expression is tenable if the mere subject is the position.

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba 'chad pa po rnams kyi nyes pa gzhan @118b dag la zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba 'chad pa po rnams kyi nyes pa gzhan @118b dag la zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
translated: “Another” refers to the other faults of the expounders.

original: rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa bdag nyid bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa bdag nyid bstan to //
translated: By this expression “in this,” he shows himself to be the author of the commentary.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: The phrase that which is to be accomplished and so forth.🔽

original: de'i tshe na de'i chos yin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par rtsom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe na de'i chos yin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par rtsom pa'o //
translated: The phrase “that which is to be established” and so on begins the explanation of the phrase “the property of that which possesses the property to be established.”

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang chos can gyi tshogs pa ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang chos can gyi tshogs pa ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “the collection of the property to be established and the subject” is the position.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i chos can ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba'i chos can ni phyogs yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The subject that is doubtful with regard to the property to be established is the position.

original: de la ste grub pa'i mtha' 'di rnam par gnas pa na'o //
analyzed: de la ste grub pa'i mtha' 'di rnam par gnas pa na'o //
translated: In that, that is, when this tenet is established.

original: de'i cha nyid pas zhes bya ba ni phyogs pa'i cha nyid pas so //
analyzed: de'i cha nyid pas zhes bya ba ni phyogs pa'i cha nyid pas so //
translated: Because of being a part of that, that is, because of being a part of the position.

original: des ni chos can gyis so //
analyzed: des ni chos can gyis so //
translated: By that, that is, by the subject.

original: des na ste bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyis ma khyab pas na /
analyzed: des na ste bsgrub par bya ba'i chos kyis ma khyab pas na /
translated: Therefore, because the property to be established is not pervaded by that,

original: bstan bcos mdzad pas smos so //
analyzed: bstan bcos mdzad pas smos so //
translated: the author of the treatise mentions it.

original: ci skad smos shen /
analyzed: ci skad smos shen /
translated: What is mentioned?

original: de'i cha ni de'i chos yin gyi zhes so //
analyzed: de'i cha ni de'i chos yin gyi zhes so //
translated: The phrase “the property of that which possesses the property to be established.”

original: yang ci ltar na gnyi ga brjod pa chos kyi sgras chos can 'dzin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na gnyi ga brjod pa chos kyi sgras chos can 'dzin zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how is it that the term property, which expresses both, refers to the subject?

original: cha'i sgra zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: cha'i sgra zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The term part.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: smra ba po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: smra ba po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The speaker.

original: smra ba po'i bsam pa yang de ltar ci ste 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: smra ba po'i bsam pa yang de ltar ci ste 'gyur snyam na /
translated: How could the speaker’s intention be like that?

original: phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The part.

original: phyogs gcig tsam zhes bya ba ni chos can gyi mtshan nyid dam chos kyi mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tsam zhes bya ba ni chos can gyi mtshan nyid dam chos kyi mtshan nyid de //
translated: “Just a part” means the definition of the subject or the definition of the property.

original: gnyis 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang chos nyid 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis 'dzin pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang chos nyid 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: It is not the apprehension of both, but rather the apprehension of the property itself.

original: 'dis ni rnam par bshad pa mdzad pas /
analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par bshad pa mdzad pas /
translated: This is the explanation by the commentator.

original: cha'i sgra phyogs gcig brjod pa kho nar bshad kyi chos brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gsal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: cha'i sgra phyogs gcig brjod pa kho nar bshad kyi chos brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar gsal ba kho na'o //
translated: The word “part” is explained as expressing just a part, but it does not express the property.🔽This is made clear.

original: phyogs gcig tsam ni 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las snyam na /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tsam ni 'dzin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ga las snyam na /
translated: How do we know that it is not the apprehension of just a part?

original: gsungs pa ni phyogs kyi sgras zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa ni phyogs kyi sgras zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is “The word ‘part’ . . . ”

original: gtsor spyi rjod par byed pa ma yin pa nyid gsungs pa ni phyogs kyi zhes bya pa'o //
analyzed: gtsor spyi rjod par byed pa ma yin pa nyid gsungs pa ni phyogs kyi zhes bya pa'o //
translated: The statement “It is not primarily the expression of the universal” is “The word ‘part’ . . . ”

original: 'di yang phyogs kyi chos nyid 'dzin pa na yod pa'i phal pa'i tshogs pa phyogs su brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang phyogs kyi chos nyid 'dzin pa na yod pa'i phal pa'i tshogs pa phyogs su brjod pa yin no //
translated: Here, too, the term “place” refers to the ordinary collection of things that exist at the time of the possession of the property of the position.

original: bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i dus na yod pa ni dngos po yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba rtogs pa'i dus na yod pa ni dngos po yin no //
translated: The property to be established is the thing that exists at the time of the understanding of the meaning.

original: 'on ci ltar spyi'i don rtogs snyam na /
analyzed: 'on ci ltar spyi'i don rtogs snyam na /
translated: But how is the meaning of the universal understood?

original: spyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “universal” is used.

original: shugs ni khyad par can rtogs pa ni khyad par rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: shugs ni khyad par can rtogs pa ni khyad par rtogs pa ma yin no zhes bya bas so //
translated: The meaning of the word “universal” is not understood by the understanding of the particular.

original: khyad par rtogs pa de yang lhag par sgro 'dogs pa'i bdag nyid can sngar bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: khyad par rtogs pa de yang lhag par sgro 'dogs pa'i bdag nyid can sngar bstan pa nyid do //
translated: The understanding of the particular is the same as the previously explained understanding that has the nature of the superimposition of the universal.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba ni chos can gyi'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos la the tshom za ba ni chos can gyi'o //
translated: The doubt about the property to be established is the doubt about the subject.

original: ci'i phyir zhen /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhen /
translated: Why is that?

original: de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “that” refers to the property to be established.

original: bdag nyid ni bdag nyid kyi chos ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ni bdag nyid kyi chos ma yin te /
translated: The property is not the property of itself.

original: chos dang chos can ni tha dad pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos dang chos can ni tha dad pa la brten pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the property and the subject are based on a difference.

original: phyogs kyi sgras spyi brjod na cir 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: phyogs kyi sgras spyi brjod na cir 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If the word “position” refers to the universal, what follows?

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If” is the word.

original: gtso bor mtshungs pa'i cha shas gang dag yin pa'i cha shas de gnyis kyi spyi gang yin pa de'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: gtso bor mtshungs pa'i cha shas gang dag yin pa'i cha shas de gnyis kyi spyi gang yin pa de'i dngos po'o //
translated: The universal of those two parts that are similar in the primary part is the thing.

original: ldog pa brjod pa ni /🔽de @119a * //
analyzed: ldog pa brjod pa ni / de @119a * //
translated: The exclusion is stated:

original: ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ltar yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In that way.”

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skabs nye bar sdud pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni skabs nye bar sdud pa'o //
translated: “Therefore” is the summary of the topic.

original: de ltar bdag cag gi ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar bdag cag gi ltar na /
translated: In that way, for us,

original: de btags nas phyogs kyi sgra gzhan du rtogs pa ma yin no bstan nas /
analyzed: de btags nas phyogs kyi sgra gzhan du rtogs pa ma yin no bstan nas /
translated: the word “part” is not understood elsewhere as a metaphor.

original: nyes pa gzhan brjod pa ni /
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan brjod pa ni /
translated: Having taught that, he states another fault:

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Moreover,” etc.

original: 'dod pa rjes su gnang ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'dod pa rjes su gnang ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin snyam na /
translated: What is the characteristic of allowing the desire?

original: rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “One’s own” is the word.

original: nye bar brtags pa khas blangs kyang bdag cag gi ltar na nyes pa med do zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: nye bar brtags pa khas blangs kyang bdag cag gi ltar na nyes pa med do zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: Even though the imputation is accepted, he says that there is no fault for us:

original: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Or else,” is the word.

original: dgos pa de gang zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa de gang zhe na /
translated: What is the purpose of that?

original: nye bar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Appropriation” is the word.

original: gzhan la yang dgos pa de yod do snyam na /
analyzed: gzhan la yang dgos pa de yod do snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that purpose exists for others,🔽“

original: khyed la zhes smos te rigs pa can la sogs pa la ni de ma thag par brjod pa'i dgos pa de ltar ma yin pa'i phyir te khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyed la zhes smos te rigs pa can la sogs pa la ni de ma thag par brjod pa'i dgos pa de ltar ma yin pa'i phyir te khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The word you is used because the purpose of the statement is not to refute the Naiyāyikas and so on, but to refute the Sāṃkhyas, who do not accept that.

original: nged kyis ni gzhan gyi rtsod pa bsal ba don du nye bar btags pa la brten pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nged kyis ni gzhan gyi rtsod pa bsal ba don du nye bar btags pa la brten pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that we refute the opponent's argument based on what is imputed to be the purpose.

original: nges par bzung ba des bzlog par bya ba'o //
analyzed: nges par bzung ba des bzlog par bya ba'o //
translated: The word only excludes that.

original: dngos te zhes bya ba ni dor nas so //
analyzed: dngos te zhes bya ba ni dor nas so //
translated: The word thing means after discarding.

original: 'on te grub pa bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dgag pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho nas 'phangs pa yin pas /
analyzed: 'on te grub pa bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dgag pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho nas 'phangs pa yin pas /
translated: But if the establishment of what is established is only implied by the definition of the proof, etc. to be refuted,

original: des par gzung ba 'dis ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: des par gzung ba 'dis ci bya zhe na /
translated: what is the use of this exclusion?

original: de ni zhes smos so //
analyzed: de ni zhes smos so //
translated: To this, he says that.

original: don de zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i don de'o //
analyzed: don de zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i don de'o //
translated: The word that refers to the meaning of what is not established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽sgrub byed kyi mtshan nyid brjod ba'i shugs las so //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / sgrub byed kyi mtshan nyid brjod ba'i shugs las so //
translated: Why is that?🔽Because it is implied by the statement of the definition of the proof.

original: de zhes bya ba grub pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba grub pa bzlog pa'i don du'o //
translated: The word that is for the purpose of excluding the established.

original: 'on te ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin pa bzlog pa'i don du nges par gzung ba yin no zhen /
analyzed: 'on te ma grub pa sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa dam bca' ba nyid yin pa bzlog pa'i don du nges par gzung ba yin no zhen /
translated: Or, if it is taught as a proof of what is not established, then the thesis itself is definitely intended to be reversed.

original: gtan tshigs sogs zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs sogs zhes gsungs so //
translated: The words “reason, etc.” are stated.

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The definition of a reason is: “A reason is that which establishes what is to be established.”

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni /
translated: The word “etc.”

original: dpe'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mtshungs pa de'i chos yod pa'i dpe ni dpe yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mtshungs pa de'i chos yod pa'i dpe ni dpe yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: refers to the definition of an example: “An example is that which has the property of the similar instance, and the property of the similar instance exists in the example.”

original: de la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gtan tshigs la sogs pa la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis gtan tshigs la sogs pa la khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since the reason, etc. are pervaded by these and other definitions,

original: sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa ni sgrub par byed pa med pa nyid du dogs pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa ni sgrub par byed pa med pa nyid du dogs pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: there is no doubt that the unestablished proof is a non-established proof.

original: des na ma grub pa'i sgrub byed dam bca' ba yin pa bsal ba'i don du ni nges par gzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na ma grub pa'i sgrub byed dam bca' ba yin pa bsal ba'i don du ni nges par gzung ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the thesis is not definitely intended to be reversed in order to eliminate the unestablished proof.

original: rnam 'grel 'di nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni 'di snyam du zhes bya ba'o //🔽de bsgrub bar bya ba nyid ci ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam 'grel 'di nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhan gyi dogs pa bsu ba ni 'di snyam du zhes bya ba'o // de bsgrub bar bya ba nyid ci ltar yin zhe na /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: sgrub par byed pas ni zhes bya ba'o //🔽der zhes bya ba ni sgrub bar byed pa nyid du bstan pa ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pas ni zhes bya ba'o // der zhes bya ba ni sgrub bar byed pa nyid du bstan pa ma grub pa'o //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:

original: ci ltar gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khyab snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khyab snyam na /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:

original: ci ltar @119b sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa spangs pa de bzhin du dpe dang chos mthun pas bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyis spangs pa yin no zhes rjes su 'jug
analyzed: ci ltar @119b sgrub par byed pa nyid du bstan pa spangs pa de bzhin du dpe dang chos mthun pas bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid kyis spangs pa yin no zhes rjes su 'jug
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:🔽The meaning of this is as follows:

original: go // ci ltar spangs snyam na bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: go // ci ltar spangs snyam na bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: gtan tshigs nyid yin la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid yin la zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya ma yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase “because of the reason itself” means that it is not the probandum.

original: gang gi phyir de lta ma yin pa 'dis ni zhes bya ba de bas na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta ma yin pa 'dis ni zhes bya ba de bas na /
translated: The phrase “since it is not like that” means that it is not the case.

original: sngar nges par bzung na /
analyzed: sngar nges par bzung na /
translated: If the thesis is stated first,

original: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid brjod ba don med do //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i mtshan nyid brjod ba don med do //
translated: then the statement of the reason is pointless.

original: ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The statement of the reason and so on is for the purpose of eliminating the possibility that the thesis is a nonestablished proof and so on.

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho nas dam bca' ba nyid yin pa bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kho nas dam bca' ba nyid yin pa bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the reason and so on are only the characteristics of the thesis.

original: gang gi tshe phyis nges par gzung ba brjod pa de'i tshe ni /🔽de'i phyir zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i ngag las /
analyzed: gang gi tshe phyis nges par gzung ba brjod pa de'i tshe ni / de'i phyir zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa ni dam bca' ba nyid do zhes bya ba'i ngag las /
translated: If the thesis is stated later,🔽then the statement of the probandum, “because of that,” is the thesis.

original: phyis nges par gzung ba de brjod pas shugs kyis khyab pa'i 'bras can yin par rtogs so //
analyzed: phyis nges par gzung ba de brjod pas shugs kyis khyab pa'i 'bras can yin par rtogs so //
translated: This is because the later statement of the thesis is understood to be the result of the pervasion by the force of the statement, “The thesis is that.”

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni phyis nges par gzung pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni phyis nges par gzung pa'o //
translated: The phrase “that also” refers to the later statement of the thesis.

original: khyab pa na ha cang thal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab pa na ha cang thal ba'o //
translated: The absurd consequence is that the pervasion is too broad.

original: 'di ga las snyam na 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ga las snyam na 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is asked, from where? it is said, “like this.”

original: mtshan nyid gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: By another characteristic means by the characteristic of a reason, etc.

original: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan nyid gzhan gyis khyab pa yang dam bca' ba yin par ma gyur na de'i tshe phyis nges par gzung ba don med do //
analyzed: gzhan du na zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan nyid gzhan gyis khyab pa yang dam bca' ba yin par ma gyur na de'i tshe phyis nges par gzung ba don med do //
translated: Otherwise means if pervasion by another characteristic were not the thesis, then later ascertainment would be pointless.

original: rnam par bcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par bcad par bya ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there would be nothing to be eliminated.

original: gtan tshigs sogs mtshan gyis khyab phyir //
analyzed: gtan tshigs sogs mtshan gyis khyab phyir //
translated: Because it is pervaded by the characteristic of a reason, etc.

original: sgrub par byed la dgos pa'ang med //
analyzed: sgrub par byed la dgos pa'ang med //
translated: There is also no need for proof.

original: ces bya ba dang / de lta na yang /
analyzed: ces bya ba dang / de lta na yang /
translated: And although that is so,

original: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra //
analyzed: dpe dang gtan tshigs ma grub smra //
translated: You speak of unestablished examples and reasons.

original: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dam bca' bar ni thal bar 'gyur //
translated: It follows that there is a thesis.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gal bar sems pa la rtsod pa byed pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gal bar sems pa la rtsod pa byed pas /
translated: Thinking that this is contradictory, the opponent argues,

original: gal te rang nyid kyis zhes smras so //
analyzed: gal te rang nyid kyis zhes smras so //
translated: If you say, “by itself,”

original: thal bar 'gyur zhes grub pa'i mtha' smra bas thal ba brjod pa la /
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur zhes grub pa'i mtha' smra bas thal ba brjod pa la /
translated: The proponent of the thesis states the absurd consequence,

original: gzhan rigs ba can la sogs pas /
analyzed: gzhan rigs ba can la sogs pas /
translated: Others, such as the logicians,

original: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khyab pas lan btab par byas pa na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis khyab pas lan btab par byas pa na /
translated: reply by means of the characteristics of reasons, etc.

original: yang grub pa'i mtha' smra bas sngar ma grub pa'i rang bzhin phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan du brjod pa yin no zhen zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang grub pa'i mtha' smra bas sngar ma grub pa'i rang bzhin phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan du brjod pa yin no zhen zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Then, the proponent of tenets replies with “because of the previously unestablished nature,” etc.

original: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang de kho na ltar lan gzhan brjod pa zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang de kho na ltar lan gzhan brjod pa zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Similarly, “just like that” and so on should be applied to the other replies.🔽Thus,

original: des na // gtan tshigs sogs mtshan gyis khyab phyir //
analyzed: des na // gtan tshigs sogs mtshan gyis khyab phyir //
translated: “because of being pervaded by the characteristics of reasons, etc.”🔽is not connected.

original: zhes bya ba ma 'brel lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ma 'brel lo zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: phan tshun 'gal ba yis zhes @120a * //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba yis zhes @120a * //
translated: “By means of mutual contradiction”

original: bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: phan tshun gnod pa'i gzhung gis so //
analyzed: phan tshun gnod pa'i gzhung gis so //
translated: by means of a treatise that mutually harms.

original: khyed kyi gzhung phan tshun 'gal pa gang yin pa des /
analyzed: khyed kyi gzhung phan tshun 'gal pa gang yin pa des /
translated: Whatever is mutually contradictory in your treatise

original: kho bo cag thal bar brjod par byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: kho bo cag thal bar brjod par byed pa nyid de /
translated: we will use to refute you.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' bar khas len na de ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang dam bca' bar khas blangs par bya dgos so //🔽'on te spar nges par bzung ba khas len na ni de'i tshe nges par bzung ba don med par khas blangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba bstan pa dam bca' bar khas len na de ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa yang dam bca' bar khas blangs par bya dgos so // 'on te spar nges par bzung ba khas len na ni de'i tshe nges par bzung ba don med par khas blangs par 'gyur te /
translated: If you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the proof of what is not established is also a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis.

original: ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa yang gtan tshigs la sogs pas khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes mi 'dod pa thog tu 'gal ba yin no //🔽gtan tshigs 'dis sangs rgyas pa rang gi 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa ni ma yin no //🔽de lta yin dang zhes bya ba phyis nges par bzung ba yin dang ngo //🔽dam bca' ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa yang gtan tshigs la sogs pas khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes mi 'dod pa thog tu 'gal ba yin no // gtan tshigs 'dis sangs rgyas pa rang gi 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa ni ma yin no // de lta yin dang zhes bya ba phyis nges par bzung ba yin dang ngo // dam bca' ba nyid du zhes bya ba ni ma grub pa'i sgrub par byed pa la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: But if you accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis.

original: dam bca' ba ma yin pa sel te dam pa nyid du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dam bca' ba ma yin pa sel te dam pa nyid du byed do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: But if you accept that the statement of what is not established is a thesis, then you must accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis.🔽But if you accept that the statement of the probandum is a thesis, then

original: bshad pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
analyzed: bshad pa zhes bya ba ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos so //
translated: The commentary is by the master Dignaga.

original: gzhan gtan tshigs thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang dam bca' ba ni sga rtag go zhes bya ba ste 'di gnyis 'gal ba ste gnod pa der gyur pa na dam bca' ba'i skyon yin no zhes rags pa can la sogs pas brjod pa
analyzed: gzhan gtan tshigs thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang dam bca' ba ni sga rtag go zhes bya ba ste 'di gnyis 'gal ba ste gnod pa der gyur pa na dam bca' ba'i skyon yin no zhes rags pa can la sogs pas brjod pa
translated: Others say that the reason and the thesis are contradictory, as in All reasons are impermanent and The thesis is permanent, respectively. They say that this is a fault of the thesis, as stated by Prashastrapada and others.

original: gang yin pa de rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yin pa de rung ba ma yin no //
translated: That is not correct.

original: dam bca'i nyes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dam bca'i nyes pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a fault of the thesis.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni zhes bya ba ste /🔽'gal ba ni'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni zhes bya ba ste / 'gal ba ni'o //
translated: Why is that?🔽It is said that the contradiction

original: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe gang yin pa der brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i dpe gang yin pa der brjod pa yin no //
translated: is in the dissimilar example.

original: sgra ni rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dir brjod par 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: sgra ni rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'dir brjod par 'dod pa ni /
translated: In the statement Sound is permanent because everything is impermanent, what is intended is

original: sgra ni rtag ste /
analyzed: sgra ni rtag ste /
translated: Sound is permanent

original: thams cad ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: thams cad ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: because not everything is impermanent.

original: bsgrub par bya ba med pa rjes su brjod nas sgrub par byed pa med pa bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba med pa rjes su brjod nas sgrub par byed pa med pa bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
translated: Having stated the probandum, the absence of a means of affirmation, he states the probans, the absence of an object of affirmation.

original: gang mi rtag pa de ni thams cad yin no zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: gang mi rtag pa de ni thams cad yin no zhes bya bar ro //
translated: Whatever is impermanent is all.

original: des na mi rtag ba ni thams cad yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya ba la /
analyzed: des na mi rtag ba ni thams cad yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, it should be said that because all is impermanent,

original: thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: but it is said that because all is impermanent,

original: legs par ma sbyangs pa kho na'i yin pas ma sbyangs dag ces brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: legs par ma sbyangs pa kho na'i yin pas ma sbyangs dag ces brjod pa yin no //
translated: it is said that it is not well-trained.

original: rnam par 'grel pa ni gzhan dag ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'grel pa ni gzhan dag ces bya ba'o //
translated: The commentary is called others.

original: ci ltar 'di gnyis 'gal snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'di gnyis 'gal snyam na /
translated: If one wonders how these two are contradictory,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said if.

original: de ltar rtsod pa'i cha bshad nas grub mtha'i cha 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar rtsod pa'i cha bshad nas grub mtha'i cha 'chad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the parts of the debate in that way, the parts of the philosophical position are explained.

original: de la smras pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la smras pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: To that, it is said...

original: re zhig bstan bcos mdzad pa rang nyid lan gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig bstan bcos mdzad pa rang nyid lan gsungs pa ni /
translated: First, the author of the treatise himself states the answer.

original: 'gal ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Contradictory...

original: de lta na ni zhas bya ba gal te phan pa med pa @120b lhan cig gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin na /
analyzed: de lta na ni zhas bya ba gal te phan pa med pa @120b lhan cig gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin na /
translated: If, in that case, it is contradictory because that which is not beneficial does not coexist,

original: de'i tshe yan lag gi skyon thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yan lag gi skyon thams cad phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur te /
translated: then at that time all the faults of the component parts would be faults of the whole.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i go skabs med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i go skabs med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there would be no opportunity for the faults of the proof.

original: tha mi dad kyang logs su brjod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: tha mi dad kyang logs su brjod par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that even though they are not different, they would be stated separately,

original: dam bca' ba'i don la gnod pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i don la gnod pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it would be undermined with respect to the meaning of the thesis.

original: de ltar phan mi 'dogs pa'i phyogs bzlog nas /
analyzed: de ltar phan mi 'dogs pa'i phyogs bzlog nas /
translated: Having thus refuted the position that it is not beneficial,

original: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyogs sel ba brjod pa ni /
analyzed: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i phyogs sel ba brjod pa ni /
translated: the statement that refutes the position that it does not coexist is:

original: 'on te lhan cig mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te lhan cig mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “If it is the nature of that which does not coexist…”

original: ma 'brel ba zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: ma 'brel ba zhes bya ba rjes su 'jug go //
translated: “Unrelated” is supplied.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni chos can sgra la thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i phyir gtan tshigs yod pa na /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni chos can sgra la thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i phyir gtan tshigs yod pa na /
translated: “If” means that if the reason exists, “because all impermanent things are seen to be produced,”

original: dam bca' ba rtag pa nyid sel bar byed pa des na ma grub pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dam bca' ba rtag pa nyid sel bar byed pa des na ma grub pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: The thesis of permanence is refuted by that, so it is not unestablished.

original: lan ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “If that is so . . . .”

original: tshad ma gang gis chos can sgra la thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs nges pa de nyid kyis /
analyzed: tshad ma gang gis chos can sgra la thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs nges pa de nyid kyis /
translated: By whatever valid cognition the reason “because all are impermanent” is ascertained with respect to the subject, sound,

original: sgra rtag go zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba la gnod pa des na tshad mas bsal bas phyogs ltar snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra rtag go zhes bya ba'i dam bca' ba la gnod pa des na tshad mas bsal bas phyogs ltar snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: by that very [valid cognition] the thesis “sound is permanent” is undermined. Therefore, it is a position that is to be refuted by valid cognition.

original: 'di ni mngon sum la sogs pas bsal ba'i phyogs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni mngon sum la sogs pas bsal ba'i phyogs ltar snang ba'i nang du 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is included among the positions that are refuted by direct perception and so on.

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i phyogs ltar snang ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽mi rtag gtan tshigs dang ldan bas //
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal ba zhes bya ba'i phyogs ltar snang ba gzhan du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // mi rtag gtan tshigs dang ldan bas //
translated: The meaning is that it is not a different kind of position that is called “the reason and thesis are contradictory.”

original: zhes bya ba'i rnam 'grel gyi don dza yantas bshad pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rnam 'grel gyi don dza yantas bshad pa ni /
translated: The meaning of the commentary on the line “The impermanent is the reason” is explained by Jayanta as follows.

original: gal te sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid dang / des kyang gtan tshigs dang ldan bar rjod par byed na /
analyzed: gal te sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid dang / des kyang gtan tshigs dang ldan bar rjod par byed na /
translated: If one were to say that sound itself is impermanent, and that it is the reason,

original: de'i tshe de ltar de thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas phyogs de bsal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe de ltar de thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bas phyogs de bsal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then at that time, since all of that is impermanent, the position would be refuted by that.

original: gzhan dag ni bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan du 'chad de /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas gzhan du 'chad de /
translated: Others, following the explanation, explain it differently.

original: gal te sgra la mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan par gyur pas /
analyzed: gal te sgra la mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan par gyur pas /
translated: If one were to say that sound is the reason for impermanence,

original: de ltar zhes bya ba thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes rjod par byed na /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes rjod par byed na /
translated: and that all of that is impermanent,

original: de'i tshe de ltar zhes bya ba gzhan gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs dang dam bca' pa 'gal bas phyogs de ni bzlog pa ste bsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de ltar zhes bya ba gzhan gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i gtan tshigs dang dam bca' pa 'gal bas phyogs de ni bzlog pa ste bsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, since the reason and thesis that the other party asserts would be contradictory, that position would be refuted, that is, eliminated.

original: 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: 'chad pa ni /
translated: The explanation is as follows.🔽If one were to say that sound is the reason for impermanence,

original: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan pas sgra la de ltar rab tu brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs dang ldan pas sgra la de ltar rab tu brjod pa yin na /
translated: and that all of that is impermanent,

original: de'i tshe bsal bar 'gyur ba zhig na zhes sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i tshe bsal bar 'gyur ba zhig na zhes sbyar te /
translated: At that time, it would be removed.

original: 'di yang yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'o na ci yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'di yang yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // 'o na ci yin snyam na /
translated: This also does not exist. This is the meaning.🔽What is it?

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of that.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here means

original: sgra ni rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir @121a * //
analyzed: sgra ni rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir @121a * //
translated: Sound is permanent because everything is impermanent.

original: ro zhes bya ba'i ngag la'o //
analyzed: ro zhes bya ba'i ngag la'o //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: dpe bstan pa las don gzhan gtan tshigs bstan pa ci zhig yod de med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpe bstan pa las don gzhan gtan tshigs bstan pa ci zhig yod de med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the purpose of teaching an example that is different from the reason? Nothing exists. This is the meaning.

original: dpe bstan pa nyid 'dir don yin no zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dpe bstan pa nyid 'dir don yin no zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: The meaning is that the teaching of the example itself is the meaning here.

original: chos kyi mthun pa'i dpe bstan pa de gang yin snyam na /
analyzed: chos kyi mthun pa'i dpe bstan pa de gang yin snyam na /
translated: What is the teaching of a concordant example?

original: sgra rtag ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra rtag ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Sound is permanent.

original: gzhan gyis 'di yang ma sbyangs pas brjod pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyis 'di yang ma sbyangs pas brjod pa yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: The opponent says that this is also not well-established, and so it is said:

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here also means

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ston pa yin no zhes bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe ston pa yin no zhes bya ba nyid do //
translated: That itself means that the teaching of a discordant example is itself.

original: 'di gtan tshigs su zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di gtan tshigs su zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is a reason means

original: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di gtan tshigs ston pas na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba yin na'o //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i sgra 'di gtan tshigs ston pas na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba yin na'o //
translated: if this word because all are impermanent shows a reason, then it becomes a reason.

original: 'on te sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid ston par byed pa des na /
analyzed: 'on te sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid ston par byed pa des na /
translated: But if it shows impermanence in sound itself, then

original: gtan tshigs dang dam bca' bdag 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dam bca' bdag 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: the reason and the thesis are contradictory.

original: de ltar ni zhes smos te /
analyzed: de ltar ni zhes smos te /
translated: In that case, it is said,

original: sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra nyid la mi rtag pa nyid ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: it shows impermanence in sound itself.

original: 'dis ni 'di la dper bstan pa nyid las zhes bya ba la sogs pa las /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di la dper bstan pa nyid las zhes bya ba la sogs pa las /
translated: This is indicated by the example in this regard, etc.

original: mi rtag pa gtan tshigs dang ldan pas zhes bya ba rigs par nye bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa gtan tshigs dang ldan pas zhes bya ba rigs par nye bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: It shows that it is reasonable to say because impermanence is the reason.

original: ci ltar mi rtag pa nyid ston par mi 'thad snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar mi rtag pa nyid ston par mi 'thad snyam na /
translated: How is it unreasonable to show impermanence?

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said in this way, etc.

original: khyad par gal te chos can sgra la gzhan te 'gal ba rtag pa nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: khyad par gal te chos can sgra la gzhan te 'gal ba rtag pa nyid brjod nas /
translated: If a particular is stated, such as sound, which is different from the subject, and permanence, which is contradictory, is expressed,

original: spyi ni ste chos can thams cad khyab pa'i mi rtag pa nyid rjes su 'jug pas te /
analyzed: spyi ni ste chos can thams cad khyab pa'i mi rtag pa nyid rjes su 'jug pas te /
translated: The universal, i.e., impermanence, which pervades all subjects, is excluded, i.e., is not expressed,

original: brjod pas na /
analyzed: brjod pas na /
translated: by the expression🔽“sound is impermanent.”

original: sgra'i mtshan nyid khyad par te mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyis khyab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i mtshan nyid khyad par te mi rtag pa nyid kyi spyis khyab pa ma yin no //
translated: The universal, i.e., impermanence, does not pervade the particular, i.e., sound.

original: sgra rtag go zhes khyad par brjod pa ni dmigs kyis bsal ba yin la /
analyzed: sgra rtag go zhes khyad par brjod pa ni dmigs kyis bsal ba yin la /
translated: The expression “sound is permanent” is an exception.

original: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes spyi brjod pa ni spyir btang ba yin no //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes spyi brjod pa ni spyir btang ba yin no //
translated: The expression “because all are impermanent” is a general statement.

original: des na dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul spangs nas /
analyzed: des na dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul spangs nas /
translated: Therefore, having excluded the object of the exception,🔽the general statement is applied.

original: spyir btang ba 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas /
analyzed: spyir btang ba 'jug pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas /
translated: By this reasoning,

original: sgra ni spyis ma khyab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra ni spyis ma khyab par 'gyur ro //
translated: sound is not pervaded by the universal.

original: khyab na yang sgra mi rtag go zhes brjod pa la 'bras bu ci yod de /
analyzed: khyab na yang sgra mi rtag go zhes brjod pa la 'bras bu ci yod de /
translated: Even if it were pervaded, what would be the point of saying “sound is impermanent”?

original: dgos pa ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dgos pa ci yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There would be no point at all.

original: des na de ni mi brjod pa kho nar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na de ni mi brjod pa kho nar thal bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it would follow that it would not be expressed at all. This is the idea.

original: gal te gnyis pa spyi dang khyad par ston par byed pa nyid yin yang spyir btang ba dang dmigs kyis bsal ba'i bdag nyid yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gnyis pa spyi dang khyad par ston par byed pa nyid yin yang spyir btang ba dang dmigs kyis bsal ba'i bdag nyid yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If you think that even though the second is that which teaches the general and the specific, it is not of the nature of the general statement and the exception,

original: smra ba po'i 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
analyzed: smra ba po'i 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dogs na /
translated: because it is not the assertion of the speaker,

original: sgra las byung ba'i rigs pa nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i rigs pa nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: the commentary on the very logic that arises from the words is

original: sgra las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “from the words.”

original: sgra thams cad ni sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rjes su 'jug par rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽gnod par bya ba yang aa na'i rkyen gyis @121b bsgrubs pa yin la /
analyzed: sgra thams cad ni sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rjes su 'jug par rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // gnod par bya ba yang aa na'i rkyen gyis @121b bsgrubs pa yin la /
translated: The meaning is that all words are understood to engage in affirmation and negation.🔽The object of refutation is established by the condition of the affix a.

original: gnod par byed pa ni a'a nye bar bsgyur ba dang bral ba las /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa ni a'a nye bar bsgyur ba dang bral ba las /
translated: The refutation is from the absence of the affix a.

original: ka zhes bya bas /
analyzed: ka zhes bya bas /
translated: The affix ka is

original: ka'i rkyen gyis bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: ka'i rkyen gyis bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: established by the condition of the affix ka.

original: nges pa yang gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa zhes rjes su 'jug go //
analyzed: nges pa yang gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa zhes rjes su 'jug go //
translated: The certainty also engages in the object of refutation and the refutation.🔽Here, the certainty that Devadatta himself should eat

original: 'dir lhas byin nyid kyis bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni /
analyzed: 'dir lhas byin nyid kyis bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i nges pa ni /
translated: Here, the certainty that Devadatta himself will eat is🔽

original: mchod sbyin za bar sgrub pas gnod pa yin no//
analyzed: mchod sbyin za bar sgrub pas gnod pa yin no//
translated: The argument is faulty because it is based on a false analogy.

original: 'dir lhas byin kho nas gnas par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dir lhas byin kho nas gnas par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The statement “only Devadatta is to be sustained”

original: gzhan gnas pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gnas pa la gnod par byed pa yin no //
translated: is a refutation of the sustenance of others.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa dang nges pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa dang nges pa la'o //
translated: “ In this case” refers to the proof and the conclusion.

original: spyi dang khyad par brjod pa bdag nyid gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par brjod pa bdag nyid gnod par bya ba dang gnod par byed pa'i dngos por 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The general and specific statements are to be understood as the object of refutation and the refutation.

original: gal te gnod bya gang yin pa de ni dang po nye bar blang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gal te gnod bya gang yin pa de ni dang po nye bar blang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: The object of refutation is to be taken up first,

original: dper na las la ni aa na'i rkyen to zhes bya ba dang / bram ze rnams la zho sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na las la ni aa na'i rkyen to zhes bya ba dang / bram ze rnams la zho sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: just as the condition of the vowel a is taken up first in the statement “a is the condition of an,” and just as the Brahmins are to be given yogurt first in the statement “yogurt is to be given to the Brahmins.”

original: gnod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni phyis nye bar len pa yin te /
analyzed: gnod par byed pa gang yin pa de ni phyis nye bar len pa yin te /
translated: The refutation is to be taken up later,

original: dper na a'a nye bar bsgyur ba med las ni ka'o zhes bya ba dang koo di n+ya la dar ba byin cig ces bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na a'a nye bar bsgyur ba med las ni ka'o zhes bya ba dang koo di n+ya la dar ba byin cig ces bya ba bzhin no //
translated: just as the condition of the consonant k is taken up later in the statement “k is from a without the near-neighbor,” and just as the cloth is to be given later in the statement “give the cloth to Kauṇḍinya.”

original: 'dir ni phyin ci log tu gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir ni phyin ci log tu gyur te /
translated: But here it is the opposite.

original: des na ci ltar sgra rtag pa yin te zhes bya ba gnod par byed pa dang / thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba phyis nye bar blangs pa gnod par bya bar yang ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: des na ci ltar sgra rtag pa yin te zhes bya ba gnod par byed pa dang / thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba phyis nye bar blangs pa gnod par bya bar yang ci ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: Therefore, how could the statement “Sound is permanent” be the refutation, and how could the later statement “Because all is impermanent” be the refutation?

original: de la res 'ga' zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de la res 'ga' zhes gsungs so //
translated: The answer is: sometimes.

original: sngar gnod par bya ba zhes bya ba las la ni aa na'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar gnod par bya ba zhes bya ba las la ni aa na'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the former case, the refutation is first, and the statement “Because all is impermanent” is the object of refutation.

original: res 'ga' ni sngar gnod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni sngar gnod par byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Sometimes the refutation is first,

original: dper na koo di n+ya la dar ba byin cig / bram ze rnams la ni zho byin cig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: dper na koo di n+ya la dar ba byin cig / bram ze rnams la ni zho byin cig ces bya ba ste /
translated: for example, “Give curd to Kaundinya, but give rice to the brahmins.”

original: des rim pa nges pa yod pa ma yin no //🔽des na sgra rtag ste zhes bya ba gnod par byed pa ni dang po yin la /
analyzed: des rim pa nges pa yod pa ma yin no // des na sgra rtag ste zhes bya ba gnod par byed pa ni dang po yin la /
translated: Therefore, the order is not fixed.

original: phyis kyi thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gnod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phyis kyi thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gnod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement “Sound is permanent” is the refutation, and the later statement “Because all is impermanent” is the object of refutation.

original: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni gnod bya gnod byed snga phyi nges pa med kyang ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni gnod bya gnod byed snga phyi nges pa med kyang ngo //
translated: “In every way” means that there is no certainty as to who is the victim and who is the aggressor.

original: 'di 'dra bar gnas pa yang ga las yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'di 'dra bar gnas pa yang ga las yin snyam na /
translated: But how can this be so?

original: tha snyad ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha snyad ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Convention” means🔽that this method of sound is also present here.

original: sgra'i tshul 'di ni 'dir yang yod pa yin no zhes ston pas rnam 'grel rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: sgra'i tshul 'di ni 'dir yang yod pa yin no zhes ston pas rnam 'grel rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The commentary on the Commentary on Valid Knowledge says,

original: 'dir yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Here also” means

original: phyir de ltar gnod par bya ba dang / gnod par byed pa'i dngos po 'thad kyi /
analyzed: phyir de ltar gnod par bya ba dang / gnod par byed pa'i dngos po 'thad kyi /
translated: that thus the victim and the aggressor are tenable.

original: gang gis dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal bas phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur bar dag gzhan gyis sgra nyid mi rtag pa ston par ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs 'gal bas phyogs kyi skyon du 'gyur bar dag gzhan gyis sgra nyid mi rtag pa ston par ni 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not tenable for another to demonstrate that sound is impermanent, since the thesis and the reason are contradictory and thus there is a fault in the position.

original: sgra rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la @122a * //
analyzed: sgra rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di la @122a * //
translated: “Sound is permanent” is the thesis.

original: rjes su mthun pa'i dpe brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i dpe brjod pa ni /
translated: The statement of a corresponding example is

original: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Just as”

original: khyad par gyis spyi la gnod pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid ga las she na /
analyzed: khyad par gyis spyi la gnod pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid ga las she na /
translated: . How can it be that a particular contradicts a universal?

original: dmigs kyis bsal pa'i yul bzhag ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal pa'i yul bzhag ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The exception is the object to be excluded.

original: dper brjod pa'i don dpe'i don la nye bar sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: dper brjod pa'i don dpe'i don la nye bar sbyor ba ni /
translated: The meaning of the example is applied to the meaning of the example:

original: de'i phyir spyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba na ;
analyzed: de'i phyir spyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba na ;
translated: Therefore, when the universal is applied,

original: khyad par sgra de mi rtag pa nyid spyis khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par sgra de mi rtag pa nyid spyis khyab pa yin no //
translated: the particular is pervaded by the universal.

original: des na gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bstan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //🔽spyi rjes su 'jug pa la'ang zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: des na gnod bya gnod byed kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bstan pa ni ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o // spyi rjes su 'jug pa la'ang zhes bya ba rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the meaning is that the quality of impermanence is not taught to be in sound, because there is no relation of the harmed and the harmer.🔽The commentary on when the universal is applied is:

original: spyi rjes su 'jug pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: spyi rjes su 'jug pa la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: When the universal is applied means when the universal is applied.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par khyab pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par khyab pa'o //
translated: The this is the particular that is pervaded.

original: tshig gi zhes bya ba ni thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshig gi shugs kyis so //
analyzed: tshig gi zhes bya ba ni thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tshig gi shugs kyis so //
translated: The force of the words is the force of the words because all are impermanent.

original: don 'di yin te /
analyzed: don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows:

original: gal te khyad par khyab pa ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par khyab pa ma yin na /
translated: If the particular were not pervaded,

original: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig nyid mi 'thad do zhes ni brjod par mi bya ste /🔽ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tshig nyid mi 'thad do zhes ni brjod par mi bya ste / ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Another fault is stated:🔽If🔽If sound is to be taught as impermanent,🔽then the statement “Sound is permanent because all are impermanent” should be reversed.🔽Sound is permanent because it is impermanent.

original: tshig ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshig ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If it is said in that way, what is the fault?🔽Otherwise🔽If sound is permanent, then the statement “Sound is impermanent because it is a product” should be reversed.

original: sgra ma rtogs pa'i chos can gzhan la tshig gi don byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ma rtogs pa'i chos can gzhan la tshig gi don byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Sound is permanent because it is a product.🔽If it is said in that way, what is the fault?🔽The words🔽are not tenable because the meaning of the words is not understood.

original: nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni /🔽gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni / gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Another fault is stated:🔽If🔽If sound is to be taught as impermanent,🔽then the statement “Sound is permanent because all are impermanent” should be reversed.

original: gal te sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bstan par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bstan par bya ba yin na /
translated: Sound is permanent because it is impermanent.🔽If it is said in that way, what is the fault?🔽Otherwise🔽If sound is permanent, then the statement “Sound is impermanent because it is a product” should be reversed.

original: de'i tshe sgra rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes dor la /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgra rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes dor la /
translated: Sound is permanent because it is a product.🔽If it is said in that way, what is the fault?🔽The words🔽are not tenable because the meaning of the words is not understood.🔽Another fault is stated:🔽If🔽If sound is to be taught as impermanent,🔽then the statement “Sound is permanent because all are impermanent” should be reversed.

original: sgra ni rtag te mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra ni rtag te mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Sound is permanent because it is impermanent.🔽If it is said in that way, what is the fault?🔽Otherwise

original: gal te de ltar brjod na yang ci skyon snyam na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar brjod na yang ci skyon snyam na /
translated: If sound is permanent, then the statement “Sound is impermanent because it is a product” should be reversed.🔽Sound is permanent because it is a product.🔽If it is said in that way, what is the fault?🔽The words🔽are not tenable because the meaning of the words is not understood.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Another fault is stated:🔽If🔽If sound is to be taught as impermanent,🔽then the statement “Sound is permanent because all are impermanent” should be reversed.

original: khyad par dag ni zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag go //
analyzed: khyad par dag ni zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dag go //
translated: Sound is permanent because it is impermanent.🔽If it is said in that way, what is the fault?

original: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Otherwise

original: yul gcig la 'jug pa yin dang ngo //
analyzed: yul gcig la 'jug pa yin dang ngo //
translated: If sound is permanent, then the statement “Sound is impermanent because it is a product” should

original: de skad ni smra ba su yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de skad ni smra ba su yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: No one says that.

original: des na dam bca' ba'i 'gal ba zhes bya bar tshar bcad pa'i gnas ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: des na dam bca' ba'i 'gal ba zhes bya bar tshar bcad pa'i gnas ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, there is no such thing as a “contradiction in a thesis” that constitutes a ground for refutation.

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni rmongs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni rmongs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Anticipating an objection, he says, “because of confusion.

original: gal te yang ma rmongs pa de skad mi smra ba de lta na yang rmongs pa'i blo can 'ga' zhig smra bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: gal te yang ma rmongs pa de skad mi smra ba de lta na yang rmongs pa'i blo can 'ga' zhig smra bar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Even if the unconfused person does not say that, some confused person might say it.

original: de bzhin bsam pa'i dbang gis 'gal ba'i dper byed pa ni 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin bsam pa'i dbang gis 'gal ba'i dper byed pa ni 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, it is reasonable to give an example of a contradiction by the power of thought.

original: lan ni de lta bu ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni de lta bu ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The answer is “That is not so.

original: rmongs tshabs che ba yang ngo //
analyzed: rmongs tshabs che ba yang ngo //
translated: ” It is also very confused.

original: 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ste sgra nyid la'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid du zhes bya ba ste sgra nyid la'o //
translated: “Here” means in the sound itself.

original: 'di ni smra ba'i dbang du bya ba yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ni smra ba'i dbang du bya ba yang ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: He says that it is not even the case that sound is the object of speech.

original: gang la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “For whom” means “for anyone.

original: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni rmongs pa'i blo can no //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ces bya ba ni rmongs pa'i blo can no //
translated: ” “Some” means a confused person.

original: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe ni zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: “At that time” means in the philosophical system.

original: sbyor ba ni zhes bya bas ni sbyor ba bya ba'i phyir gzhan @122b slob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni zhes bya bas ni sbyor ba bya ba'i phyir gzhan @122b slob par byed pa'o //
translated: “Application” means that one is teaching others in order to apply the reason.

original: sgra ni rtag ste mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes sbyor ba'i sgra ni rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni rtag ste mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes sbyor ba'i sgra ni rtag ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: The word “permanent” is a reason, because of impermanence, but the word “permanent” is not a reason, because of the impermanence of everything.

original: 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor ba ni 'gal ba'i dper mi 'thad do zhes bstan zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di 'dra ba'i sbyor ba ni 'gal ba'i dper mi 'thad do zhes bstan zin pa nyid do //
translated: It has already been demonstrated that such an application is not a valid example of a contradictory reason.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i dper brjod du 'thad pa kho na'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i dper brjod du 'thad pa kho na'o //
translated: “Because of impermanence” is a valid example of a contradictory reason.

original: ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: de lta bu ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “That way” means “in that way.”

original: des na zhes bya ba ni mi rtag par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni mi rtag par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Therefore” means “because of becoming impermanent.”

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “For that very reason” means “because of contradiction.”

original: bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rnam 'grel mdzad pas so //
analyzed: bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rnam 'grel mdzad pas so //
translated: “Explained” means “composed by the author of the commentary.”

original: slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyis so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyis so //
translated: “The master” means the root master.

original: gal te sgra la gnas pa yin na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gnas na'o //
analyzed: gal te sgra la gnas pa yin na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gnas na'o //
translated: “If the reason is established with regard to sound” means “if the reason is established.”

original: 'di ga las she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las she na /
translated: Why is this?

original: sgra la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the word “sound.”

original: gal te gnyi ga ltar yang sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bstan pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gnyi ga ltar yang sgra la mi rtag pa nyid bstan pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If both were taught, then impermanence would be taught with respect to sound.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ste thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni'o //
translated: This is because everything is impermanent.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni sgra las ma gtogs pa'i chos can gzhan la'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni sgra las ma gtogs pa'i chos can gzhan la'o //
translated: Elsewhere means with respect to a subject other than sound.

original: sel ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid sel ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sel ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgra'i mi rtag pa nyid sel ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: It is not excluded means that the impermanence of everything is not excluded by the word “impermanent.”

original: skabs kyi mjug sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: skabs kyi mjug sdud pa ni des na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conclusion of the section is “Therefore . . . ”

original: thams cad mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni chos mi mthun pa'i dper brjod par zad kyi gtan tshigs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni chos mi mthun pa'i dper brjod par zad kyi gtan tshigs ni ma yin no //
translated: This statement, “Everything is impermanent,” is merely an example of a dissimilar reason, but it is not a reason.

original: gal te sgra mi rtag sti dam bca' ba yin la /
analyzed: gal te sgra mi rtag sti dam bca' ba yin la /
translated: If “Sound is impermanent” is the thesis,

original: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe yin na /
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe yin na /
translated: and “Because everything is impermanent” is the dissimilar example,🔽then . . .

original: 'o na gtan tshigs gang yin snyam par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: 'o na gtan tshigs gang yin snyam par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: The doubt is anticipated with the words

original: de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “that” and so on.

original: bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyis so //
analyzed: bshad pa zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i slob dpon gyis so //
translated: The explanation is by the root teacher.

original: gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi chos so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi chos so //
translated: The reason is the property of the position.

original: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam par bshad pa mdzad pa nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: The words “where” and so on are the verse of the commentator himself.

original: lnga pas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lnga pas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The fifth is the word “only.”

original: thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pas so //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pas so //
translated: Because everything is impermanent, it is taught.

original: 'di ci ltar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di ci ltar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The words “how is this” are

original: thams cad ma yin pa nyid gtan tshigs su ci ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: thams cad ma yin pa nyid gtan tshigs su ci ltar rtogs she na /
translated: “how is it understood that the reason is not everything?”

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The words “elsewhere” are

original: thams cad ma yin par ro //
analyzed: thams cad ma yin par ro //
translated: “not everything.”

original: de ni gtan tshigs ma yin te ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de ni gtan tshigs ma yin te ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: That is not a reason because it is not established.

original: thams cad ma yin pa de'ang sgra la 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad ma yin pa de'ang sgra la 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: That “not everything” is not tenable for sound.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi ni khyad par mi spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi ni khyad par mi spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the universal does not exclude the particular.

original: spyi ni khyad par spong ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: spyi ni khyad par spong ba ma yin gyi /
translated: The universal does not exclude the particular,

original: 'on kyang 'phangs nas gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'phangs nas gnas pa nyid do //
translated: but rather, it is located in the particular.

original: @123a * // dper na shing gi sha pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bzhin no //
analyzed: @123a * // dper na shing gi sha pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the particular, the trunk of a tree, and so on.🔽In the same way, sound is projected by all,

original: de bzhin du thams cad kyis ni sgra yang 'phen pa yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad kyis ni sgra yang 'phen pa yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: because all are the cause of the projection of sound.

original: sgra ni thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: sgra ni thams cad kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, sound is all.

original: des na 'di ni thams cad ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: des na 'di ni thams cad ma yin pa nyid du ma grub pa'o //
translated: Thus, this is not established as not being all.

original: gal te gang gis 'di ma grub pa nyid du brjod par 'gyur ba ci ltar ni 'di gtan tshigs brjod pa yin snyam na /
analyzed: gal te gang gis 'di ma grub pa nyid du brjod par 'gyur ba ci ltar ni 'di gtan tshigs brjod pa yin snyam na /
translated: If one asks, “How is this stated as a reason, since it is not established?,”

original: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad mi rtag pa nyid kyis khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is stated as a reason in the sense that all is pervaded by impermanence.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pas khyab pa'i thams cad las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pas khyab pa'i thams cad las so //
translated: “From that” means from all that is pervaded by impermanence.

original: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba rtag pa'i'o //
analyzed: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba rtag pa'i'o //
translated: “This” refers to the probandum, permanence.

original: khyad par rnams nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni khra bo ni ser skya spangs nas gnas kyi ba lang nyid ni khyad par spangs nas gnas pa ma yin te khyad par gcig dor na khyad par gzhan la nges pa'i phyir ro //
