analyzed: khyad par rnams nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni khra bo ni ser skya spangs nas gnas kyi ba lang nyid ni khyad par spangs nas gnas pa ma yin te khyad par gcig dor na khyad par gzhan la nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “In particular, the particulars themselves” means that a multicolored object, having abandoned yellow, remains, but the cow-ness does not remain, having abandoned the particulars, because when one particular is eliminated, the other particulars are ascertained.

original: sgra ni tshang ba ma yin no zhes 'brel to ci ltar zhe na /
analyzed: sgra ni tshang ba ma yin no zhes 'brel to ci ltar zhe na /
translated: “Sound is not complete” is the connection. How is that?

original: gang gi phyir sgra ni phyogs gcig yin pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgra ni phyogs gcig yin pas so //
translated: Because sound is a part.

original: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: That is not so, this is the response.

original: gal te spyi ni rang gi khyad par spong bar mthong ba yin no zhes dogs pa ni /
analyzed: gal te spyi ni rang gi khyad par spong bar mthong ba yin no zhes dogs pa ni /
translated: If you think that a universal is seen to abandon its own particulars,

original: shing zhes bya ba'o lan ni dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: shing zhes bya ba'o lan ni dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: the response is “For example,” and so on.

original: 'ga' zhig gis shing ni sha pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis shing ni sha pa kho na'o zhes brjod pa na /
translated: If someone says, “A tree is only a birch tree,”

original: de la lan du shing sha pa nyid ni shing min zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de la lan du shing sha pa nyid ni shing min zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the response is “Birch-tree-ness is not a tree.”

original: shing nyid nges par 'gog pa yin gyi /
analyzed: shing nyid nges par 'gog pa yin gyi /
translated: It is a definite negation of tree-ness.

original: shing nyid dang bral ba kho na shing sha pa yin no zhes ni ston pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shing nyid dang bral ba kho na shing sha pa yin no zhes ni ston pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not taught that a tree is a śimśapā tree only when it is devoid of treehood.

original: de bzhin du thams cad kyi sgra ma nyan pa gnyi ga nyid la 'jug pa 'gog pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad kyi sgra ma nyan pa gnyi ga nyid la 'jug pa 'gog pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the word all is used to refer to both, and the objection is refuted.

original: de tsam gyis thams cad min zhes bya ba ni /🔽thams cad kyi sgra'i 'jug pa nges pa bkag pa tsam gyis ni /
analyzed: de tsam gyis thams cad min zhes bya ba ni / thams cad kyi sgra'i 'jug pa nges pa bkag pa tsam gyis ni /
translated: The statement “It is not all because of that alone” means🔽that the word all is not all

original: sgra de thams cad ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra de thams cad ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: merely by the negation of the restriction of its application.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyad par kun so sor sgra bzhin du thams cad ma yin par gyur na /
analyzed: khyad par kun so sor sgra bzhin du thams cad ma yin par gyur na /
translated: If all the particulars were not all because of being like the word,

original: thams cad de med 'gyur phyir te mi srid par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad de med 'gyur phyir te mi srid par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then it would be impossible for all to be that.

original: des na 'ga' yang thams cad du mi 'gyur ba zhig na 'dod pa yang yin no //
analyzed: des na 'ga' yang thams cad du mi 'gyur ba zhig na 'dod pa yang yin no //
translated: Therefore, although it is asserted that nothing is all,

original: de'i phyir sgra thams cad kyi nang na yod pa'i phyir de thams cad ma yin pa nyid dang ma grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra thams cad kyi nang na yod pa'i phyir de thams cad ma yin pa nyid dang ma grub po //
translated: since it is contained within all words, it is not established that it is not all.

original: gal te sgra gcig pu kho na thams cad ma yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te sgra gcig pu kho na thams cad ma yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: If you think that only one sound is not all, but the others are,

original: des na ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni /🔽'on te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu ba ni / 'on te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is not the case that the reason is not established.🔽The response to this qualm is “But if that is so . . .”

original: lan ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni de lta yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “In that case . . .”

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: sgra mi rtag ste bcom yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag ste bcom yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Sound is impermanent because it is a product.

original: sgra thams cad ni chos can yin la /
analyzed: sgra thams cad ni chos can yin la /
translated: All sounds are the subject.

original: gtan tshigs kyang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyang de nyid yin no //
translated: The reason is also that.

original: des na spyi'i dngos pos kyang gtan tshigs nyid @123b ma yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //🔽dpe la gzhan gyis log par rtogs pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: des na spyi'i dngos pos kyang gtan tshigs nyid @123b ma yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro // dpe la gzhan gyis log par rtogs pa'i dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Therefore, even by the general thing, the reason is not established.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to the qualm of the opponent’s misconception about the example is “If you think . . .”

original: ci ltar ma grub ste grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci ltar ma grub ste grub pa kho na'o //
translated: What is not established? It is established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is because of its own nature.

original: gcom nyid ni sgra'i rang bzhin yin pas de med na sgra nyid med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcom nyid ni sgra'i rang bzhin yin pas de med na sgra nyid med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since being a product is the nature of sound, if it does not exist, sound itself would not exist.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: des na ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na ma grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, the meaning is that it is not established.

original: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “No.”

original: 'o na ci ltar ma grub snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ltar ma grub snyam na /
translated: If you ask, “How is it not established?”

original: gtan tshigs nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “The reason itself.”

original: gtan tshigs nyid du ci ltar ma grub snyam na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du ci ltar ma grub snyam na /
translated: If you ask, “How is the reason itself not established?”

original: gtan tshigs nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “The reason itself.”

original: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa ma yin na'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa ma yin na'o //
translated: “Otherwise” means if they are not different.

original: tha mi dad kyang ci ste bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi dngos po ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: tha mi dad kyang ci ste bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi dngos po ma yin snyam na /
translated: If you ask, “Why is it not the case that even if they are not different, they are the relation of the probandum and the proof?”

original: sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is “The word.”

original: don 'di yin te /🔽chos can nyid sgrub par byed pa yin par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: don 'di yin te / chos can nyid sgrub par byed pa yin par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.🔽Either the subject itself would be the proof,

original: chos can nyid spyis ni gtan tshigs yin la khyad par gyis ni bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur /🔽de la re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can nyid spyis ni gtan tshigs yin la khyad par gyis ni bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur / de la re zhig phyogs dang po ni ma yin te /
translated: or the reason would be the subject itself in general, and the probandum would be the subject itself in particular.

original: tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: First, the first possibility is not tenable because they are not different.

original: 'di ltar chos can grub ba'am ma grub pa zhig yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos can grub ba'am ma grub pa zhig yin par 'gyur /
translated: In that case, the subject would either be established or not established.

original: gal te grub na ni de'i tshe shes par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te grub na ni de'i tshe shes par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: If it were established, then it would not be an object of knowledge.

original: shes par bya ba ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes par bya ba ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is to be known is not established.

original: 'o na ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Well, then, it is not established.

original: ma grub pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma grub pas ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is not established, as stated.

original: ma grub na ni gtan tshigs nyid ma grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma grub na ni gtan tshigs nyid ma grub par 'gyur te /
translated: If it is not established, then the reason itself is not established,

original: shes par ba ba'i sgra ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes par ba ba'i sgra ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word “to be known” is not established.

original: yang grub pa nyid du dogs pa bsu nas sel bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: yang grub pa nyid du dogs pa bsu nas sel bar byed pa ni /
translated: Again, anticipating the doubt that it is established, he dispels it:

original: de ste grub po zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ste grub po zhe na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If, on the other hand, it is established.

original: gzhan yang gal te chos can nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te chos can nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na de'i tshe spyi bsgrub par bya ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, if the subject itself is the proof, then at that time the universal would not be the object to be established.

original: phyogs gnyis pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs gnyis pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The second position is also not so,

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi ngo bos gtan tshigs tha dad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi ngo bos gtan tshigs tha dad par 'gyur te /
translated: because the reason would be different in terms of the nature of the universal and the particular.

original: ba lang gi sgra 'di ni mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra 'di ni mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir /
translated: This word “cow” is impermanent because it is sound,

original: bum pa'i sgra bzhin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: bum pa'i sgra bzhin no zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: like the word “pot.”

original: 'on kyang rnam pa 'di ni sgra ni mi rtag ste bcom pa'i phyir zhes bya ba skabs 'dir brjod par 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam pa 'di ni sgra ni mi rtag ste bcom pa'i phyir zhes bya ba skabs 'dir brjod par 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: However, this is not the aspect that is intended here, in the statement, “Sound is impermanent because it is produced,”

original: sgra thams cad chos can nyid blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra thams cad chos can nyid blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because all sounds are taken as the subject.

original: de'i tshe yang chos can gang yin pa de nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang chos can gang yin pa de nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: And at that time, whatever is the subject becomes the reason.

original: ci'i phyir brjod par mi 'dod snyam na /🔽thal zin pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir brjod par mi 'dod snyam na / thal zin pa la /
translated: If it is asked why it is not intended,🔽it is said, “Because it is already implied.”

original: ltos te dpe nyid du nye bar blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos te dpe nyid du nye bar blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is already implied as an example in dependence.

original: dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The anticipation of doubt is “If it is said . . .”

original: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya mi rtag pa nyid ni sgrub par byed pa mi 'dod mod ces bya @124a * //
analyzed: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya mi rtag pa nyid ni sgrub par byed pa mi 'dod mod ces bya @124a * //
translated: “Only” means that the probandum, impermanence, is not intended to be established.

original: pa'o ; /'di la lan ni 'gal ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa'o ; /'di la lan ni 'gal ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response to that is “Contradictory.”

original: ci ltar 'gal snyam na /
analyzed: ci ltar 'gal snyam na /
translated: If it is asked how it is contradictory,

original: sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is because of being sound.

original: tshogs pa mi 'gal bar dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa mi 'gal bar dogs pa bsu ba ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The anticipation of doubt regarding the noncontradiction of the collection is “If it is said . . .”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If it is asked why,🔽. . .

original: sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is sound.

original: don 'di bsgrub pa'i phyir dpe brjod pa ni /
analyzed: don 'di bsgrub pa'i phyir dpe brjod pa ni /
translated: In order to prove this meaning, an example is stated:

original: du ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: du ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: like smoke.

original: 'dir lan ni de la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir lan ni de la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here the reply is: in regard to that.

original: du ba yin pa'i phyir du ba me dang ldan par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: du ba yin pa'i phyir du ba me dang ldan par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes 'brel to //
translated: Because it is smoke, smoke is just as if it were associated with fire.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na //
translated: Why is that?

original: du ba de la ni spyi dang zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: du ba de la ni spyi dang zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: In regard to that smoke, the general property and so on is applied.

original: 'dir yang ni sgra la'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang ni sgra la'o //
translated: Here also the word “too” is applied.

original: gal te de ltar byed na spyi sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: gal te de ltar byed na spyi sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: If one proceeds in this way, then the reason is established as a general property.

original: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni sgra ni mi rtag ste gcom yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni zhes bya ba ni sgra ni mi rtag ste gcom yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bar ro //
translated: Here, the word “too” is applied to the statement, “Sound is impermanent because it is produced.”

original: gal te sgra zhes bya ba nas bzung nas skyon med do zhe na zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni rtsod pa'o //🔽ci gal te 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te sgra zhes bya ba nas bzung nas skyon med do zhe na zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa ni rtsod pa'o // ci gal te 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
translated: If one begins with the words “sound” up to “there is no fault” is the debate.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: What is the point? If there is no contradiction, then what?🔽When?

original: sgra chos can yin pa na'o //
analyzed: sgra chos can yin pa na'o //
translated: When sound is the subject.

original: chos can ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur na ni sgra'i rang bzhin nyid yin bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos can ni sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur na ni sgra'i rang bzhin nyid yin bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the subject were the proof itself, then it would be the nature of sound.

original: thun mong gi rang bzhin ni gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir sgra zhes smos so //
analyzed: thun mong gi rang bzhin ni gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir sgra zhes smos so //
translated: Sound is mentioned because the common nature is the reason.

original: 'brel pa yid na de'i tshe ci ltar zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa yid na de'i tshe ci ltar zhes sbyar ro //
translated: If there is no relation, then how?

original: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba med na'o //
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni 'brel ba med na'o //
translated: If that is so, if there is no relation,

original: ma nges pa nyid yin te zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog par the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma nges pa nyid yin te zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog par the tshom za ba'i phyir ro //
translated: it is uncertain, because there is doubt about the reversal from the discordant side.

original: 'on te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni grub pa'i mtha' smra ba'i dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: If, on the other hand, etc. anticipates the objection of the proponent of tenets.

original: sgrub par byed pa yang bstan par bya ba nyid dang ldan par te 'brel bar ma grub pa'o //🔽khyad par 'ga' yang zhes bya ba ni chos can gyi rang bzhin las sam /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang bstan par bya ba nyid dang ldan par te 'brel bar ma grub pa'o // khyad par 'ga' yang zhes bya ba ni chos can gyi rang bzhin las sam /
translated: The proof is also not established as connected with what is to be indicated.

original: chos kyi rang bzhin las so //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin las so //
translated: Any distinction means from the nature of the subject or from the nature of the property.

original: gal te chos can nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te chos can nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
translated: If the subject itself is the proof,🔽then the reason would be pointless.

original: de'i tshe gtan tshigs gzhi ma grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshe gtan tshigs gzhi ma grub po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: At that time, the reason is said to be unestablished.

original: yang zhes bya ba chos can dang sgrub par byed pa gnyi ga brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba chos can dang sgrub par byed pa gnyi ga brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Again, neither the subject nor the proof is to be stated,

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because sound is impermanent because it is sound is not to be stated.

original: des na gal te chos can sgrub par byed pa nyid du byed na de'i tshe sgra mi rtag ste zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: des na gal te chos can sgrub par byed pa nyid du byed na de'i tshe sgra mi rtag ste zhes bya ba'am /
translated: Therefore, if the subject is to be established, then at that time, sound is impermanent should be stated,

original: yang na sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: or because it is sound should be stated.

original: chos can dang gtan tshigs gnyis su brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can dang gtan tshigs gnyis su brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Both the subject and the reason are not to be stated.

original: de ltar grub pa'i mtha' bkod nas lan 'debs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar grub pa'i mtha' bkod nas lan 'debs pa ni /
translated: Having thus presented the tenet, the reply is:

original: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is not so.

original: de zhes bya ba gtan tshigs gzhan la ltos pa spang ba'i @124b phyir na'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba gtan tshigs gzhan la ltos pa spang ba'i @124b phyir na'o //
translated: The word that is for the purpose of excluding the dependence on another reason.

original: chos can gzhan ni sel ba la zhes bya ba'i chos can gzhan bsal ba'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
analyzed: chos can gzhan ni sel ba la zhes bya ba'i chos can gzhan bsal ba'i rgyu mtshan du'o //
translated: “Another subject” is the reason for the exclusion of another subject.

original: chos can dang sgrub sgrub par byed pa gnyi gar sbyar bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos can dang sgrub sgrub par byed pa gnyi gar sbyar bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that both the subject and the probandum are to be applied.

original: 'dis smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
analyzed: 'dis smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan no //
translated: The response to this is stated in the words “This is what he said . . .”

original: sgra nyid kyi mtshan nyid sgrub byed kyi rang bzhin du gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la /
analyzed: sgra nyid kyi mtshan nyid sgrub byed kyi rang bzhin du gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la /
translated: The subject that is the nature of the proof of the definition of sound

original: gal te rtag pa nyid bsgrub par nus pa yod pa yin na de'i tshe sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs gzhan blangs pa don med do //
analyzed: gal te rtag pa nyid bsgrub par nus pa yod pa yin na de'i tshe sgra nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs gzhan blangs pa don med do //
translated: If it is possible to prove that sound is permanent, then it is pointless to accept the other reason, “because it is sound.”

original: 'on te chos can la nus pa med pa de lta na yang sgra yin pa'i phyir ro zhes yang brjod pa des ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: 'on te chos can la nus pa med pa de lta na yang sgra yin pa'i phyir ro zhes yang brjod pa des ci zhig bya ste /
translated: But if the subject is incapable of that, then what is the point of stating again, “because it is sound”?

original: nus pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is incapable.

original: chos can la nus pa med na /
analyzed: chos can la nus pa med na /
translated: If the subject is incapable of that,

original: de'i rang bzhin du gyur ba'i sgrub par byed pa yang nus pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du gyur ba'i sgrub par byed pa yang nus pa med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the proof that has that as its nature is also powerless.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mi nus pa dang mi dgos pa'i nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mi nus pa dang mi dgos pa'i nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of that means because of the fault of being powerless and purposeless.

original: yang bstan pa la zhes bya ba ni sgra mi rtag pa zhes bya ba de la /
analyzed: yang bstan pa la zhes bya ba ni sgra mi rtag pa zhes bya ba de la /
translated: Again, in the teaching means in the statement sound is impermanent.

original: ltos te yang sgra mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ltos te yang sgra mi rtag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In dependence on that, because sound is impermanent is stated.

original: de la brjod par 'dod pa gang yin pa sgrub par byed pa las tha dad pa'i sgra mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par dang ldan par brjod pa 'dod pa de 'dir med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brjod par 'dod pa gang yin pa sgrub par byed pa las tha dad pa'i sgra mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad par dang ldan par brjod pa 'dod pa de 'dir med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There, whatever is intended to be expressed is endowed with the particularity of sound's impermanence, which is different from the proof. Because that is not intended to be expressed here, it is not established.

original: ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi ma grub pa nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi ma grub pa nyid kyi'o //
translated: Not established means because of the basis not being established.

original: 'dis ni sgra mi rtag ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa bsal ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni sgra mi rtag ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsod pa bsal ba yin no //
translated: This eliminates the dispute about sound is impermanent and so on.

original: des na ma grub pa nyid ces bya ba'i skyon ni med de zhes bya ba'i rtsod pa nye bar 'god pa ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des na ma grub pa nyid ces bya ba'i skyon ni med de zhes bya ba'i rtsod pa nye bar 'god pa ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the fault called “unproven” does not exist.

original: lan 'debs pa ni nyes pa de yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan 'debs pa ni nyes pa de yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: “That fault also . . .”

original: nges pa med pa brjod pa'i skabs su ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nges pa med pa brjod pa'i skabs su ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the context of the expression of uncertainty,

original: gang gi tshe nyes pa gcig kho na brjod par bya'o zhes tshad ma byas pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nyes pa gcig kho na brjod par bya'o zhes tshad ma byas pa'i tshe'o //
translated: when one does not measure the expression of a single fault,

original: nges pa brjod pa'i skabs su ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: nges pa brjod pa'i skabs su ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: it is not reasonable in the context of the expression of certainty.

original: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa mi rigs snyam na /🔽pha ma zin pa la te ma grub pa'i nyes pa brjod pas rdugs par byas zin pa la /
analyzed: ci ltar rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa mi rigs snyam na / pha ma zin pa la te ma grub pa'i nyes pa brjod pas rdugs par byas zin pa la /
translated: How is it that the fault of non-pervasion is not reasonable?🔽When one is blocked by the expression of the fault of unproven subject,

original: pha ma pa ste rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa brjod pa'i sgo nas rdugs pa gang yin pa ste med ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha ma pa ste rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa brjod pa'i sgo nas rdugs pa gang yin pa ste med ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the expression of the fault of non-pervasion, the fault of non-subject, does not exist.

original: rdugs zin pa la ni rdugs pa 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rdugs zin pa la ni rdugs pa 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: When one is already blocked, it is not tenable that one is blocked again.

original: de ltar gyur na ni thug pa med pas rtsod pa ngag rdzogs pa'i mtha' med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur na ni thug pa med pas rtsod pa ngag rdzogs pa'i mtha' med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then since there would be no end to that, the dispute would be endless.

original: 'on te rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa nyid thog mar ci ste mi brjod snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa nyid thog mar ci ste mi brjod snyam na /
translated: But if you think, “Why not state the fault of non-pervasion first?”

original: ba rgal zhing brtag par bya ba rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yal @125a * //
analyzed: ba rgal zhing brtag par bya ba rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa yal @125a * //
translated: The fault of non-pervasion is set aside in the middle

original: bar dor ba'i phyir na thog mar mi brjod do //
analyzed: bar dor ba'i phyir na thog mar mi brjod do //
translated: because it is a matter of debate and is to be investigated.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore means

original: gzhi ma grub pas ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pas ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is not established.

original: mi rigs pa ni mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: mi rigs pa ni mi nus pa'o //
translated: Unreasonable means impossible.

original: chos can nus so zhe na ni /
analyzed: chos can nus so zhe na ni /
translated: If you say, “The subject is possible,”

original: de'i tshe rtsod pa med par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rtsod pa med par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: then it follows that there is no dispute,

original: chos can grub pa tsam gyis grub pas na rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can grub pa tsam gyis grub pas na rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mere establishment of the subject is established, and there is no need to rely on pervasion and so on.

original: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa med na'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa med na'o //
translated: Even so means even if there is no dispute.

original: des na ste mi rigs pas na chos can ni rang gi chos kyi sgrub byed du ma grub bo //
analyzed: des na ste mi rigs pas na chos can ni rang gi chos kyi sgrub byed du ma grub bo //
translated: Therefore, because it is unreasonable, the subject is not established as the proof of its own predicate.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: chos can gtan tshigs dngos gyur ni //
analyzed: chos can gtan tshigs dngos gyur ni //
translated: Because the subject is the actual evidence.

original: zhes bya ba gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bkod pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bkod pa ni /
translated: The subject is the actual evidence that is set forth as the evidence.

original: shes par byed pa nyid gang yin pa der ma grub pa'i phyir te shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes par byed pa nyid gang yin pa der ma grub pa'i phyir te shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not established as that which causes understanding, because it is that which is to be understood.

original: shes par bya ba yin yang shes byed ci ste ma yin snyam na /
analyzed: shes par bya ba yin yang shes byed ci ste ma yin snyam na /
translated: If you think, “Even though it is that which is to be understood, why is it not that which causes understanding?,”

original: shes bya bshes byed tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes bya bshes byed tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because that which is to be understood and that which causes understanding are different.

original: de med na ni tha dad pa med na'o //
analyzed: de med na ni tha dad pa med na'o //
translated: If they do not exist, they are not different.

original: de med kyang ci ltar ma grub snyam na gsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de med kyang ci ltar ma grub snyam na gsal ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think, “Even if they do not exist, why are they not established?,” they are called “manifest.”

original: gsal ba la sogs pa ni rang nyid shes bar gyur na bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gsal ba la sogs pa ni rang nyid shes bar gyur na bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa yin na /
translated: If a manifest pot, etc. is itself understood, it causes the understanding of a pot, etc.

original: de bzhin du shes par byed pa yang shes par bya ba las tha dad par shes par gyur na shes par bya ba shes par byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes par byed pa yang shes par bya ba las tha dad par shes par gyur na shes par bya ba shes par byed par 'gyur te /
translated: In the same way, if that which causes understanding is understood as different from that which is to be understood, that which is to be understood causes the understanding of that which causes understanding.

original: shes par bya ba ni shes par byed pa las rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes par bya ba ni shes par byed pa las rang bzhin tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is to be understood is different by nature from that which causes understanding.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pas so//
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pas so//
translated: “Therefore” means because they are not different.

original: tha dad na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tha dad na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “If they were different” means

original: gal te sgrub par byed pa chos can las tha dad par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te sgrub par byed pa chos can las tha dad par gyur na /
translated: if the proof were different from the subject,

original: de'i tshe de la rjes su 'gro ba yod dam 'on te med ces sems par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe de la rjes su 'gro ba yod dam 'on te med ces sems par 'gyur te /
translated: then one would have to consider whether or not it is related to it.

original: dper na gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzhal bya nyid bzhin no //
translated: For example, it would be like the object of evaluation.

original: sngar sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin grub par byas nas /
analyzed: sngar sgrub par byed pa'i rang bzhin grub par byas nas /
translated: Previously, having established the nature of the proof,

original: gzhi ma grub pa dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pa dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i nyes pa brjod pa yin la /
translated: he stated the faults of the unestablished basis and the absence of relation.

original: da lta na ni tha dad pa nyid med do zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: da lta na ni tha dad pa nyid med do zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: Now, he states that they are not different.

original: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa tsam gyis so //
analyzed: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa tsam gyis so //
translated: “By that alone” means by the mere absence of difference.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Therefore” means

original: shes byed nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes byed nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established as the proof.

original: grub pa nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos so //
analyzed: grub pa nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bos so //
translated: “Established” means by its own nature.

original: de bzhin du chos can la yang rang gi sgrub bar byed par grub pa yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos can la yang rang gi sgrub bar byed par grub pa yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: Similarly, he thinks that the subject is also established as its own proof.

original: lan ni grub pa ni zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lan ni grub pa ni zhes bya'o //
translated: The answer is: “The proof is established.”

original: mar me la sogs pa grub pa'o //
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa grub pa'o //
translated: The proof is established by the lamp, etc.

original: lkog tu gyur pa mi rtag pa nyid /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa mi rtag pa nyid /
translated: Impermanence is not directly perceived.

original: lkog tu ma gyur pa sgra la sogs pas grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: lkog tu ma gyur pa sgra la sogs pas grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not established by sound, etc., which are not directly perceived.

original: ci ltar mi mthun zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar mi mthun zhe na /
translated: How is it inconsistent?

original: mar me zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mar me zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The lamp, etc.

original: 'di skad brjod pa yin te /🔽gal te 'ga' zhig @125b dper na mar me tha dad pa med kyang rang gi sgrub par byed par grub pa de bzhin du chos can sgra yang /
analyzed: 'di skad brjod pa yin te / gal te 'ga' zhig @125b dper na mar me tha dad pa med kyang rang gi sgrub par byed par grub pa de bzhin du chos can sgra yang /
translated: This is what is being said:🔽If someone thinks that, just as the lamp, etc., are established as the proof of themselves, even though they are not different, in the same way, the subject, sound,

original: gal te yang chos can dang bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin du tha dad pa ma yin pa de lta na yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgrub byed du 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te yang chos can dang bsgrub bya'i rang bzhin du tha dad pa ma yin pa de lta na yang mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgrub byed du 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
translated: is also the proof of itself, even though it is not different from the nature of the subject and the probandum,

original: de la mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de la mi mthun pa nye bar bkod pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: then the inconsistency is stated.

original: des na gal te thams cad ma yin pa nyid sgrub byed du len pa yin na /
analyzed: des na gal te thams cad ma yin pa nyid sgrub byed du len pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, if one accepts that the non-establishment of everything is the proof,

original: de'i tshe dam bca' pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin par gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe dam bca' pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin par gnas pa nyid do //
translated: At that time, it is just the one part of the proposition that is established.

original: gal te tha dad pa med pa'i phyir thams cad la nyes pa med pa 'dir mi 'gyur ram zhes dgos pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa med pa'i phyir thams cad la nyes pa med pa 'dir mi 'gyur ram zhes dgos pa bsu ba ni /
translated: If it is asked, “Is it not the case that this fault applies to everything because of the absence of difference?”

original: dngos po kun la bya ba ste sgra dang byas pa la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: dngos po kun la bya ba ste sgra dang byas pa la sogs pa la'o //
translated: The response is, “In all things, such as sound and being produced, there is no fault.”

original: min zhes bya ba ni nyes pa mtshungs pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: min zhes bya ba ni nyes pa mtshungs pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: “No” means that the fault is not the same.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: kun rdzob tu zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is because of the relative.

original: sgra dang byas pa dag la ni /
analyzed: sgra dang byas pa dag la ni /
translated: In sound and being produced,

original: ldog pas brtags pa'i tha dad pa yod de /
analyzed: ldog pas brtags pa'i tha dad pa yod de /
translated: there is a difference that is imputed by exclusion.

original: des na chos can sgra las tha dad pa'i byas pas mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad pa can gyi sgra go bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na chos can sgra las tha dad pa'i byas pas mi rtag pa nyid kyi khyad pa can gyi sgra go bar byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, being impermanent, which is qualified by being produced that is different from the subject, sound, is what is understood.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dogs pa'o //
translated: If it is asked, “Is it not the case that the subject is not established?”

original: mngon sum du grub pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon sum du grub pa zhes bya ba ni bsgrub bya sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: “Directly established” means that it is not the case that the probandum is the proof.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbye ba brtags pa'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbye ba brtags pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the imputation of a difference in the property.

original: de la yang ni mar me la yang ngo //
analyzed: de la yang ni mar me la yang ngo //
translated: and also in the case of the lamp.

original: tha dad par brtags pas bsgrub par bya dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i don to //
analyzed: tha dad par brtags pas bsgrub par bya dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'i don to //
translated: The point of the argument is that if the probandum and probans are posited as different things, then the absurd consequence follows.

original: 'dis ni phyogs snga ma'i cha rnam par bkrol pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni phyogs snga ma'i cha rnam par bkrol pa yin no //
translated: This is the exposition of the opponent's position.

original: lan gyi cha rnam par 'grel ba ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //🔽mar me'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: lan gyi cha rnam par 'grel ba ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o // mar me'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: The exposition of the reply is not so!.

original: mar me ni chos can yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: mar me ni chos can yin no zhes bya ba'i bar ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: Beginning with The nature of the lamp, up to the lamp is the subject, is the argument.

original: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir bsam pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The idea here is this:

original: gal te kun rdzob tu sgra dang byas pa dag tha dad pa'i phyir shes par bya ba dang shes par byed pa 'di dngos po yin na /
analyzed: gal te kun rdzob tu sgra dang byas pa dag tha dad pa'i phyir shes par bya ba dang shes par byed pa 'di dngos po yin na /
translated: If, conventionally, sound and product are different, and this is the probandum and probans,

original: de'i tshe mar me la yang dbye ba brtags pas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe mar me la yang dbye ba brtags pas 'gyur ro //
translated: then in that case, the division of the lamp would be posited.

original: 'on te 'dir med na /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir med na /
translated: But if it does not exist here,

original: sgra dang byas pa dag la yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgra dang byas pa dag la yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: then it would not exist for sound and product either.

original: tha dad par rtogs pa nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: tha dad par rtogs pa nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: The expression of the cognition of difference is

original: byed pa dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: byed pa dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “with activity.”

original: 'bras bu byed pa'i gnas skabs 'bras bu byed bzhin pa ni byed pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bu byed pa'i gnas skabs 'bras bu byed bzhin pa ni byed pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs yin la /
translated: The state of producing an effect, while in the process of producing an effect, is the state with activity.

original: 'bras bu mi bskyed pa'i gnas skabs ni byed pa med pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu mi bskyed pa'i gnas skabs ni byed pa med pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
translated: The state of not producing an effect is the state without activity.

original: des na mar me'i sgras @126a * //
analyzed: des na mar me'i sgras @126a * //
translated: Therefore, the word “lamp”

original: ni gnas skabs gnyis brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ni gnas skabs gnyis brjod pa yin no //
translated: expresses two states.

original: brjod par 'dod pa ni mar me'i sgras byed ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa ni mar me'i sgras byed ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: What is intended is that the word “lamp” expresses only the state with activity,

original: rang bzhin gyi sgras bya ba med pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi sgras bya ba med pa'i gnas skabs brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word “nature” expresses the state without activity.

original: 'dis ni chos can du rtogs pa'i sa bon bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos can du rtogs pa'i sa bon bstan to //
translated: This shows the seed of the cognition of the subject.

original: da ni bsgrub byar brtags pa'i sa bon brjod pa ni /
analyzed: da ni bsgrub byar brtags pa'i sa bon brjod pa ni /
translated: Now, the expression of the seed of the imagined probandum is

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “nature.”

original: rang bzhin gyi sgras ni byed pa dang bcas pa dang byed pa med pa'i gnas skabs gnyis yal bar dor ba rang bzhin ma yin pa las ldog pa'i dngos po brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi sgras ni byed pa dang bcas pa dang byed pa med pa'i gnas skabs gnyis yal bar dor ba rang bzhin ma yin pa las ldog pa'i dngos po brjod pa yin no //
translated: The word “nature” indicates a thing that is the opposite of a non-nature, which is the rejection of both the situation in which there is activity and the situation in which there is no activity.

original: da ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ston par byed pas /
analyzed: da ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa ston par byed pas /
translated: Now, in order to show the probandum and the proof,

original: sgrub par byed pa yang ston pa ni /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang ston pa ni /
translated: he says, “The proof is also shown.”

original: de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “There” refers to the probandum.

original: don bya ba byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: don bya ba byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa yin la /
translated: The performance of a function is the proof.

original: rang bzhin ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'am /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'am /
translated: Nature is the probandum.

original: yang na bzlog pas te /
analyzed: yang na bzlog pas te /
translated: Or, it is the opposite.

original: rang bzhin ni sgrub par byed pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin ni sgrub par byed pa /
translated: Nature is the proof.

original: don bya ba byed ba ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: don bya ba byed ba ni bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The performance of a function is the probandum.

original: gnyi ga ltar yang chos can ni mar me yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga ltar yang chos can ni mar me yin no //
translated: In both cases, the subject is a lamp.

original: byed pa med pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: byed pa med pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub pa'i mtha'o //
translated: “That which is without activity” and so on is a tenet.

original: 'dis ni chos can dang bsgrub bya dang / sgrub par byed pa rnams ldog pa'i dbye bas brtags pa'i tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos can dang bsgrub bya dang / sgrub par byed pa rnams ldog pa'i dbye bas brtags pa'i tha dad pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: This is saying that the subject, the probandum, and the proof are not different in terms of their conceptual distinctions.

original: 'di ltar re zhig bya ba dang bcas pa dang bya ba med pa'i gnas skabs gnyi ga khyab pa'i chos can ni ma grub ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig bya ba dang bcas pa dang bya ba med pa'i gnas skabs gnyi ga khyab pa'i chos can ni ma grub ste /
translated: Thus, first, the subject that pervades both the state of having activity and the state of not having activity is not established.

original: bya ba med pa ni gnas skabs dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba med pa ni gnas skabs dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the state of not having activity is not a real entity.

original: des na mar me'i sgras ni bya ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kho na brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na mar me'i sgras ni bya ba dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs kho na brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the word “lamp” expresses only the state of having activity.

original: rang bzhin gyi sgras kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi sgras kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The word “nature” is also like that.

original: bya ba med pa la ni mar me'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba med pa la ni mar me'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because a lamp does not have a nature in the state of not having activity.

original: 'bras bu byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas kyang /
analyzed: 'bras bu byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas kyang /
translated: The phrase “because it produces an effect” also

original: byed pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: byed pa dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: expresses only the state of having activity.

original: de'i phyir mar me'i sgra dang / rang bzhin gyi sgra dang / 'bras bu byed pa'i sgras ni gcig nyid las ldog pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mar me'i sgra dang / rang bzhin gyi sgra dang / 'bras bu byed pa'i sgras ni gcig nyid las ldog pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the terms “sound of the lamp,” “sound by nature,” and “sound of the effect” are used to express the negation of identity.

original: des na ldog pas brtags pa'i dbye ba yang med do //
analyzed: des na ldog pas brtags pa'i dbye ba yang med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference that is imagined by the negation.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i don bya ba med pas byed pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i don bya ba med pas byed pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa'o //
translated: The argument is that since the object that is to be expressed does not exist, the lamp does not exist.

original: brjod par 'dod pa'i don ni mar mes bsgrub par bya ba'o //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa'i don ni mar mes bsgrub par bya ba'o //
translated: The object that is to be expressed is that which is accomplished by the lamp.

original: de med bas mar me byed pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: de med bas mar me byed pa med pa yin no //
translated: Since that does not exist, the lamp does not exist.

original: des na mar me byed pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyi sgras brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: des na mar me byed pa med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyi sgras brjod pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, the lamp that does not exist is expressed by the term “sound by nature,”🔽and the lamp in the state of having activity is expressed by the term “sound of the lamp.”🔽This is not correct.

original: bya ba dang bcas pa'i @126b gnas skabs ni mar me'i sgras yin no zhe na zhes ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
analyzed: bya ba dang bcas pa'i @126b gnas skabs ni mar me'i sgras yin no zhe na zhes ni mi rigs te zhes bya ba ni lan no //
translated: This is the response.

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir re zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir re zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because of the absurd consequence,

original: bya ba med pa'i ri bong gi rva la yang rang bzhin yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i ri bong gi rva la yang rang bzhin yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: the horns of a rabbit, which do not exist, would have a nature.

original: da skad brjod pas ni zhes bya ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos nyid la sogs pa brjod pas ni'o //
analyzed: da skad brjod pas ni zhes bya ba ni byed pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos nyid la sogs pa brjod pas ni'o //
translated: “Now, by the expression of the word” means by the expression of the active and the other.

original: tha dad par zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad par zhes bya ba ni dogs pa'o //
translated: “Differently” means in a different way.

original: lan ni de ni zhes bya ba ste tha dad par rtogs pa ni'o //
analyzed: lan ni de ni zhes bya ba ste tha dad par rtogs pa ni'o //
translated: The answer is “That” means the cognition of difference.

original: spyi dang zhes bya ba ni don bya ba byed pa tsam yin la /
analyzed: spyi dang zhes bya ba ni don bya ba byed pa tsam yin la /
translated: “The universal” means the mere performance of the function of the object.

original: 'bras bu byed ba'i khyad par ni mar me yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu byed ba'i khyad par ni mar me yin no //
translated: “The particular” means the particular of the performance of the effect, which is the lamp.

original: yang na rang bzhin ni spyi yin te bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa thun mong gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na rang bzhin ni spyi yin te bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa thun mong gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, the universal is the nature, because the nature is common to the pot, cloth, etc.

original: mar me ni khyad par yin no //
analyzed: mar me ni khyad par yin no //
translated: The lamp is the particular.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mar mes rang bzhin khyad par du byed de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mar mes rang bzhin khyad par du byed de /
translated: Therefore, the lamp particularizes the universal.

original: mar me'i rang bzhin zhes so //
analyzed: mar me'i rang bzhin zhes so //
translated: It is called the nature of the lamp.

original: de dag ni dngos po nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir mi byed pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos kyi dngos pos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni dngos po nyid kyis grub pa'i phyir mi byed pa dang bcas pa dang cig shos kyi dngos pos ni ma yin no //
translated: Since they are established by their own nature, they are not by the nature of the active and the other.

original: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po la tha dad pa nyid nges pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po la tha dad pa nyid nges pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there certainty of difference between the established and the means of establishment,

original: 'bras bu byed pa la sogs pa rnams la mar me las tha dad pa yod kyang de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu byed pa la sogs pa rnams la mar me las tha dad pa yod kyang de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because although the effect, etc. exist as different from the lamp, they are not that.

original: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa la nges pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa tha dad pa la nges pa yin te /
translated: However, there is certainty of difference between the established and the means of establishment,

original: de med na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med na bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because if that does not exist, the established and the means of establishment do not exist.

original: log par rtogs pa la ltos nas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po yin yang chad pa med de /
analyzed: log par rtogs pa la ltos nas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po yin yang chad pa med de /
translated: In dependence on wrong understanding, there is the established and the means of establishment, but there is no annihilation,

original: byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: just as there is production and impermanence.

original: de'i phyir chos can gyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can gyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, “by the subject” means

original: sgra ni mi rtag ste sgra yin ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra ni mi rtag ste sgra yin ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “sound is impermanent because of being a product.”

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: The explanation of “therefore” is

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “because of non-difference.”

original: 'o na byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid ci ltar tha dad snyam na byas pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'o na byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid ci ltar tha dad snyam na byas pa dang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Now, if one thinks, “How are the produced and impermanence different?”

original: don dam par tha dad pa nyid du ci ste khas mi len snyam na /
analyzed: don dam par tha dad pa nyid du ci ste khas mi len snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “Why not accept that they are different ultimately?”

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said, “In that case…”

original: mngon sum gyis ni byas pa la sogs pa tha mi dad par 'dzin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir dngos po ba'i tha dad pa la gnod par byed pa yin pa des na /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni byas pa la sogs pa tha mi dad par 'dzin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir dngos po ba'i tha dad pa la gnod par byed pa yin pa des na /
translated: Because direct perception apprehends the produced, etc., as undifferentiated, it contradicts the difference of entities.

original: ci ltar don dam par tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ltar don dam par tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, how could they be different ultimately?

original: don dam par tha dad par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
analyzed: don dam par tha dad par dogs pa bsu ba ni /
translated: Anticipating the qualm that they are different ultimately,

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, “If you think…”

original: lan ni chos can tsam ni mngon sum ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni chos can tsam ni mngon sum ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, “The mere subject is not direct perception…”

original: ci ltar gcig yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar gcig yin zhe na /
translated: How are they one?

original: mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba'o //🔽sgra las mi @127a * //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba'o // sgra las mi @127a * //
translated: It is said, “Impermanence…”

original: rtag pa nyid gzhan yin na /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid gzhan yin na /
translated: If impermanence is different from sound,

original: sgra 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni /
analyzed: sgra 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa ni /
translated: it would not apprehend sound.
